capacities.name: National Legislation, Policy, and Financing
capacities.target_description: States Parties should have an adequate legal framework to support and enable the implementation of all of their obligations and rights to comply with and implement the IHR (2005). In some States Parties, implementation of the IHR (2005) may require new or modified legislation. Even where new or revised legislation may not be specifically required under the State Party’s legal system, States may still choose to revise some legislation, regulations or other instruments in order to facilitate their implementation and maintenance in a more efficient, effective or beneficial manner. State parties should ensure provision of adequate funding for IHR implementation through national budget or other mechanism.
capacities.desired_impact: Legislation, laws, regulations, administrative requirements, policies or other government instruments and budget in place sufficiently support IHR implementation.
capacities.notes: National legislation, policy and financing: These questions should be answered by legal or legislative advisers, experts at the MoH or other relevant government office/NFP. Please ask to see the relevant documents.

indicators.name: Legislation, laws, regulations, administrative requirements, policies or other government instruments in place are sufficient for implementation of IHR.

score_descriptions.1: Assessment of relevant legislation, regulation, administrative requirements and other government instruments for IHR (2005) implementation not carried out
score_descriptions.2: Assessment of relevant legislation, regulation, administrative requirements and other government instruments for IHR (2005) implementation has been carried out
score_descriptions.3: Recommendations following assessment of relevant legislation, regulations, administrative requirements and other government instruments are implemented
score_descriptions.4: Policies to facilitate IHR NFP core and expanded functions and to strengthen core capacities
score_descriptions.5: Policies to facilitate IHR NFP core and expanded functions and to strengthen core capacities incorporated within the national health sector plan (NHSP)

actions.name: Review and revise IHR legislation

inputs.name: Hire national consultant to provide expert advice

line_items.name: Daily fees (total)
line_items.description: Fees for 60-days of consultant time to provide expert advice regarding the development of legislation and regulation for IHR implementation
line_items.function_tag: Planning including assessment, design, planning, policy, legislation
line_items.references: Equivalent of 60 days' work by external consultant (national) for research, meetings, outreach, and travel. Default fees per day is UN Level D maximum daily rate established October 2013 (Source: ST/AI/2013/4). Default per diem is official WHO/UN per diem for Nairobi, Kenya.
line_items.where_find_base_cost: Daily rate: use UN Level D or local market daily rates for expert consultant, and adjust the number of days as needed. Per diem: use official WHO/UN per diem or local government per diem.
line_items.description_fr: Honoraires pour 60 jours de temps de consultation pour fournir des conseils d'experts concernant l'élaboration de lois et de règlements pour la mise en œuvre du RSI
line_items.description_en: Fees for 60-days of consultant time to provide expert advice regarding the development of legislation and regulation for IHR implementation
line_items.function_tag_fr: Planification incluant l'évaluation, la conception, la planification, la réglementation, la législation
line_items.function_tag_en: Planning including assessment, design, planning, policy, legislation
line_items.references_fr: Équivalent de 60 jours de travail par consultant externe (national) pour la recherche, les réunions, la sensibilisation et les voyages. Les frais par jour par défaut correspondent au taux journalier maximal de niveau D des Nations Unies établi en octobre 2013 (Source: ST / AI / 2013/4). Le diem par défaut est le per diem OMS / ONU pour Nairobi, Kenya.
line_items.references_en: Equivalent of 60 days' work by external consultant (national) for research, meetings, outreach, and travel. Default fees per day is UN Level D maximum daily rate established October 2013 (Source: ST/AI/2013/4). Default per diem is official WHO/UN per diem for Nairobi, Kenya.
line_items.where_find_base_cost_fr: Tarif par jour: utiliser les tarifs par jour de niveau D de l'ONU ou les tarifs par jour du marché local pour les consultants experts, et ajuster le nombre de jours si nécessaire. Per diem: utiliser les per diem officiels de l'OMS / ONU ou du gouvernement local.
line_items.where_find_base_cost_en: Daily rate: use UN Level D or local market daily rates for expert consultant, and adjust the number of days as needed. Per diem: use official WHO/UN per diem or local government per diem.

inputs.name: Hold stakeholder workshops to review legislation

line_items.name: Workshop expenditures
line_items.description: Two small 2-day workshops for national stakeholders to review and revise relevant legislation and regulations for IHR implementation. Includes facility rental, stationary, refreshments, and other incidentals.
line_items.function_tag: Planning including assessment, design, planning, policy, legislation
line_items.references: Assume that the workshops costed as part of P.1.1 also include conversations regarding requirements for P.1.2
line_items.where_find_base_cost: Conference costs: determine per person costs for a small, full-day meeting based on local conference rates (refreshments, stationery, incidentals, and venue) at the national level. Adjust the number of participants and days as needed.
line_items.description_fr: Deux petits ateliers de deux jours à l'intention des parties prenantes nationales pour examiner et réviser les lois et règlements pertinents pour la mise en œuvre du RSI. Comprend la location d'installations, la papeterie, les rafraîchissements et autres frais accessoires.
line_items.description_en: Two small 2-day workshops for national stakeholders to review and revise relevant legislation and regulations for IHR implementation. Includes facility rental, stationary, refreshments, and other incidentals.
line_items.function_tag_fr: Planification incluant l'évaluation, la conception, la planification, la réglementation, la législation
line_items.function_tag_en: Planning including assessment, design, planning, policy, legislation
line_items.references_fr: Présumer que les ateliers évalués dans le cadre de la P.1.1 incluent également des discussions concernant les exigences pour P.1.2
line_items.references_en: Assume that the workshops costed as part of P.1.1 also include conversations regarding requirements for P.1.2
line_items.where_find_base_cost_fr: Coûts de conférence: déterminer les coûts par personne pour une petite réunion d'une journée basée sur les tarifs des conférences locales (rafraîchissements, papeterie, frais accessoires et salle) au niveau national. Ajuster le nombre de participants et les jours selon les besoins.
line_items.where_find_base_cost_en: Conference costs: determine per person costs for a small, full-day meeting based on local conference rates (refreshments, stationery, incidentals, and venue) at the national level. Adjust the number of participants and days as needed.

line_items.name: Workshop per diems
line_items.description: Per diems for national stakeholders to attend 2 small 2-day workshops to review and revise relevant legislation and regulations for IHR implementation
line_items.function_tag: Planning including assessment, design, planning, policy, legislation
line_items.references: Assume that the workshops costed as part of P.1.1 also include coversations regarding requirements for P.1.2
line_items.where_find_base_cost: Per diem: use daily rates set by national regulations, WHO/UN rates (http://apps.who.int/bfi/tsy/PerDiem.aspx), or WHO-CHOICE rates and adjust  number of participants and days as needed.
line_items.description_fr: Per diem pour les parties prenantes nationales pour assister à deux petits ateliers de deux jours pour examiner et réviser les lois et règlements pertinents pour la mise en œuvre du RSI
line_items.description_en: Per diems for national stakeholders to attend 2 small 2-day workshops to review and revise relevant legislation and regulations for IHR implementation

line_items.references_fr: Présumer que les ateliers évalués dans le cadre de la P.1.1 incluent également des discussions concernant les exigences pour P.1.2
line_items.references_en: Assume that the workshops costed as part of P.1.1 also include coversations regarding requirements for P.1.2
line_items.where_find_base_cost_fr: Per diem: utiliser les taux par jour fixés par les réglementations nationales, les taux OMS / ONU (<http://apps.who.int/bfi/tsy/PerDiem.aspx>), ou les taux WHO-CHOICE et ajuster le nombre de participants et les jours nécessaire.
line_items.where_find_base_cost_en: Per diem: use daily rates set by national regulations, WHO/UN rates (http://apps.who.int/bfi/tsy/PerDiem.aspx), or WHO-CHOICE rates and adjust  number of participants and days as needed.

line_items.name: Printed draft legislation
line_items.description: Print draft national IHR legislation for review by national stakeholders (100 copies of small print job)
line_items.function_tag: Planning including assessment, design, planning, policy, legislation
line_items.references: Assumes printing of 100 copies for meetings and for outreach to other national stakeholders at 50 pages / copy (estimate based on published health security acts).
line_items.where_find_base_cost: Printing: to estimate per-copy printing costs, multiply the local per-page printing rates by the total estimated number of pages, and adjust number of copies as needed.
line_items.name_fr: Travaux d'impression des projets de loi
line_items.description_fr: Travaux d'impression du projet de législation nationale sur le RSI pour examen par les parties prenantes nationales (100 copies d'un petit travail d'impression)
line_items.description_en: Print draft national IHR legislation for review by national stakeholders (100 copies of small print job)

line_items.references_fr: Présumer l'impression de 100 exemplaires pour les réunions et pour la sensibilisation à d'autres parties prenantes nationales à 50 pages / copie (estimation basée sur les lois publiées de sécurité sanitaire).
line_items.references_en: Assumes printing of 100 copies for meetings and for outreach to other national stakeholders at 50 pages / copy (estimate based on published health security acts).
line_items.where_find_base_cost_fr: Travaux d'impression: pour estimer les coûts d'impression par copie, multiplier les taux d'impression locaux par page par le nombre total estimé de pages, et ajuster le nombre de copies selon les besoins.
line_items.where_find_base_cost_en: Printing: to estimate per-copy printing costs, multiply the local per-page printing rates by the total estimated number of pages, and adjust number of copies as needed.

inputs.name_fr: Embaucher un avocat (local) pour fournir des conseils d'expert

actions.name_fr: Évaluer la mise en œuvre de la législation et des règlements du RSI
actions.name_en: Assess implementation of IHR legislation and policies

indicators.name_fr: La législation, les lois, les règlements, les exigences administratives, les politiques ou autres instruments gouvernementaux en place suffisent à la mise en œuvre du RSI.
indicators.name_en: Legislation, laws, regulations, administrative requirements, policies or other government instruments in place are sufficient for implementation of IHR.

score_descriptions_fr.1: Évaluation de la législation, de la réglementation, des exigences administratives et d'autres instruments gouvernementaux pertinents pour la mise en œuvre du RSI (2005) non effectuée
score_descriptions_fr.2: L'évaluation de la législation, de la réglementation, des exigences administratives et d'autres instruments gouvernementaux pertinents pour la mise en œuvre du RSI (2005) a été effectuée
score_descriptions_fr.3: Les recommandations suite à l'évaluation de la législation, de la réglementation, des exigences administratives et d'autres instruments gouvernementaux pertinents sont mises en œuvre
score_descriptions_fr.4: Réglementations visant à faciliter les fonctions de base et accrues des PFN du RSI et à renforcer les capacités de base
score_descriptions_fr.5: Réglementations visant à faciliter les fonctions de base et accrues des PFN du RSI et à renforcer les capacités de base incorporées dans lele Plan National de Développement Sanitaire (PNDS)

score_descriptions_en.1: Assessment of relevant legislation, regulation, administrative requirements and other government instruments for IHR (2005) implementation not carried out
score_descriptions_en.2: Assessment of relevant legislation, regulation, administrative requirements and other government instruments for IHR (2005) implementation has been carried out
score_descriptions_en.3: Recommendations following assessment of relevant legislation, regulations, administrative requirements and other government instruments are implemented
score_descriptions_en.4: Policies to facilitate IHR NFP core and expanded functions and to strengthen core capacities
score_descriptions_en.5: Policies to facilitate IHR NFP core and expanded functions and to strengthen core capacities incorporated within the national health sector plan (NHSP)

indicators.name: The state can demonstrate that it has adjusted and aligned its domestic legislation, policies, and administrative arrangements to enable compliance with the IHR (2005).

score_descriptions.1: Legislation, regulation, administrative requirements and other government instruments are not in place for the implementation of the IHR (2005)
score_descriptions.2: Assessment of relevant legislation, regulation, administrative requirements and other government instruments for IHR (2005) implementation has been carried out and adjustment needs have been identified
score_descriptions.3: The country can demonstrate the existence and use of relevant laws and policies in the various sectors involved in the implementation of the IHR
score_descriptions.4: The country has legislation references and/or administrative requirements for specific areas (e.g. current legislation specifically address IHR NFP designation and operations)
score_descriptions.5: The country ensures coordination of the legal and regulatory frameworks between sectors

indicators.name_fr: L'État peut démontrer qu'il a amendé et aligné sa législation, ses politiques et ses dispositions administratives internes pour permettre la conformité avec le RSI (2005).
indicators.name_en: The state can demonstrate that it has adjusted and aligned its domestic legislation, policies, and administrative arrangements to enable compliance with the IHR (2005).

score_descriptions_fr.1: La législation, la réglementation, les exigences administratives et d'autres instruments gouvernementaux ne sont pas en place pour la mise en œuvre du RSI (2005)
score_descriptions_fr.2: L'évaluation de la législation, de la réglementation, des exigences administratives et d'autres instruments gouvernementaux pertinents pour la mise en œuvre du RSI (2005) a été effectuée et les besoins d'ajustement ont été identifiés
score_descriptions_fr.3: Le pays peut démontrer l'existence et l'utilisation de lois et de politiques pertinentes dans les différents secteurs impliqués dans la mise en œuvre du RSI
score_descriptions_fr.4: Le pays a des références législatives et / ou des exigences administratives pour des domaines spécifiques (par exemple, la législation actuelle traite spécifiquement de la désignation et des opérations du NFP du RSI)
score_descriptions_fr.5: Le pays assure la coordination des cadres juridiques et réglementaires entre les secteurs

score_descriptions_en.1: Legislation, regulation, administrative requirements and other government instruments are not in place for the implementation of the IHR (2005)
score_descriptions_en.2: Assessment of relevant legislation, regulation, administrative requirements and other government instruments for IHR (2005) implementation has been carried out and adjustment needs have been identified
score_descriptions_en.3: The country can demonstrate the existence and use of relevant laws and policies in the various sectors involved in the implementation of the IHR
score_descriptions_en.4: The country has legislation references and/or administrative requirements for specific areas (e.g. current legislation specifically address IHR NFP designation and operations)
score_descriptions_en.5: The country ensures coordination of the legal and regulatory frameworks between sectors

capacities.target_description_fr: Les États parties devraient disposer d'un cadre juridique adéquat pour soutenir et permettre la mise en œuvre de toutes leurs obligations et de leurs droits de se conformer au RSI et de le mettre en œuvre (2005). Dans certains États parties, la mise en œuvre du RSI (2005) peut nécessiter une législation nouvelle ou modifiée. Même lorsqu'une législation nouvelle ou révisée n'est pas spécifiquement requise dans le système juridique de l'État partie, les États peuvent toujours choisir de réviser certaines lois, réglementations ou autres instruments afin de faciliter leur mise en œuvre et leur maintien de manière plus efficace. Les États parties devraient veiller à fournir un financement adéquat pour la mise en œuvre du RSI par le biais du budget national ou d'un autre mécanisme.
capacities.target_description_en: States Parties should have an adequate legal framework to support and enable the implementation of all of their obligations and rights to comply with and implement the IHR (2005). In some States Parties, implementation of the IHR (2005) may require new or modified legislation. Even where new or revised legislation may not be specifically required under the State Party’s legal system, States may still choose to revise some legislation, regulations or other instruments in order to facilitate their implementation and maintenance in a more efficient, effective or beneficial manner. State parties should ensure provision of adequate funding for IHR implementation through national budget or other mechanism.
capacities.desired_impact_fr: La législation, les lois, les règlements, les exigences administratives, les politiques ou autres instruments gouvernementaux et le budget en place appuient suffisamment la mise en œuvre du RSI.
capacities.desired_impact_en: Legislation, laws, regulations, administrative requirements, policies or other government instruments and budget in place sufficiently support IHR implementation.
capacities.notes_fr: Législation, réglementation et financement nationaux: Ces questions devraient recevoir une réponse de la part de conseillers juridiques ou législatifs, d'experts du ministère de la Santé ou d'un autre bureau gouvernemental / PFN pertinent. Merci de demander à consulter les documents en question.
capacities.notes_en: National legislation, policy and financing: These questions should be answered by legal or legislative advisers, experts at the MoH or other relevant government office/NFP. Please ask to see the relevant documents.

capacities.name: IHR Coordination, Communication and Advocacy
capacities.target_description: The effective implementation of the IHR (2005) requires multisectoral/multidisciplinary approaches through national partnerships for effective alert and response systems. Coordination of nationwide resources, including the sustainable functioning of a National IHR Focal Point (NFP), which is a national centre for IHR (2005) communications, is a key requisite for IHR (2005) implementation. The NFP should be accessible at all times to communicate with the WHO IHR Regional Contact Points and with all relevant sectors and other stakeholders in the country. States Parties should provide WHO with contact details of NFPs, continuously update and annually confirm them.
capacities.desired_impact: A mechanism for multisectoral/multidisciplinary coordination, communication and partnerships is functional to detect, assess and respond to any public health event or risk. The NFP is accessible at all times to communicate with the WHO IHR Regional Contact Points and with all relevant sectors and other stakeholders in the country.
capacities.notes: Additional information can be used from following indicators: D.3.1 System for efficient reporting to WHO, FAO and OIE. D.3.2 Reporting network and protocols in country. R.3.1 Public Health and Security Authorities, (e.g. Law Enforcement, Border Control, Customs are linked during a suspect or confirmed biological event).

indicators.name: A functional mechanism is established for the coordination and integration of relevant sectors in the implementation of IHR

score_descriptions.1: Coordination mechanism between relevant ministries is not in place
score_descriptions.2: Coordination mechanism between relevant ministries is in place. National Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) or equivalent exists for the coordination between IHR NFP and relevant sectors
score_descriptions.3: A multisectoral, multidisciplinary body, committee or taskforce addressing IHR requirements on surveillance and response for public health emergencies of national and international concern is in place and participated in latest event
score_descriptions.4: Multisectoral and multidisciplinary coordination and communication mechanisms are tested and updated regularly through exercises or through the occurrence of an actual event. Action plan developed to incorporate lessons learnt of multisectoral and multidisciplinary coordination and communication mechanisms
score_descriptions.5: Annual updates on the status of IHR implementation to stakeholders across all relevant sectors conducted

actions.name: Develop and implement guidance for NFP functions and coordination between relevant sectors

inputs.name: Hold stakeholder workshop to develop guidance

line_items.name: Workshop expenditures
line_items.description: Expenses for small, 1-day national workshop to develop standard operating procedures and other guidance for routine NFP functions. Includes facility rental, stationary, refreshments, and other incidentals.
line_items.function_tag: Planning including assessment, design, planning, policy, legislation
line_items.references: Equivalent of 1 full-day workshop including paid conference venue, refreshments and stationery. Assume SMALL NATIONAL meeting (see worksheet).  Default = 1 small meeting at $600/meeting.
line_items.where_find_base_cost: Conference costs: determine per person costs for full-day workshop based on local conference rates (refreshments, stationery, incidentals, and venue) at NATIONAL LEVEL. Multiply by the number of participants to determine the per workshop cost, and adjust the base multiplier (number of workshops) as needed.
line_items.description_fr: Frais pour un petit atelier national d'une journée visant à élaborer des Procédures Opérationnelles Normalisées et autres directives pour les fonctions courantes du Point Focal National. Comprend la location d'installations, la papeterie, les rafraîchissements et autres frais accessoires.
line_items.description_en: Expenses for small, 1-day national workshop to develop standard operating procedures and other guidance for routine NFP functions. Includes facility rental, stationary, refreshments, and other incidentals.
line_items.function_tag_fr: Planification incluant l'évaluation, la conception, la planification, la réglementation, la législation
line_items.function_tag_en: Planning including assessment, design, planning, policy, legislation
line_items.references_fr: Équivalent d'un atelier d'une journée comprenant un lieu de conférence payant, des rafraîchissements et de la papeterie. Présumer une réunion NATIONALE PETITE (voir fiche de travail). Par défaut = 1 petite réunion à 600 $ / réunion.
line_items.references_en: Equivalent of 1 full-day workshop including paid conference venue, refreshments and stationery. Assume SMALL NATIONAL meeting (see worksheet).  Default = 1 small meeting at $600/meeting.
line_items.where_find_base_cost_fr: Coûts de conférence: déterminer les coûts par personne pour un atelier d'une journée basé sur les tarifs des conférences locales (rafraîchissements, papeterie, frais accessoires et salle) au NIVEAU NATIONAL. Multiplier par le nombre de participants pour déterminer le coût par atelier, et ajuster le multiplicateur de base (nombre d'ateliers) selon les besoins.
line_items.where_find_base_cost_en: Conference costs: determine per person costs for full-day workshop based on local conference rates (refreshments, stationery, incidentals, and venue) at NATIONAL LEVEL. Multiply by the number of participants to determine the per workshop cost, and adjust the base multiplier (number of workshops) as needed.

line_items.name: Workshop expenditures (national level)

line_items.references: Assumes national daily travel allowance (at national rate) for each day x equivalent of 1-day workshops for trainees plus 2 trainers. Default per diem = $105 per person per day, based on WHO-CHOICE National-Level Per Diem in USD2017.
line_items.where_find_base_cost: Per diem: use daily rates set by national regulations OR use WHO/UN rates (http://apps.who.int/bfi/tsy/PerDiem.aspx) or WHO-CHOICE rates and adjust the base multiplier (number of participants eligible for per diem x number of days) as needed.

inputs.name: Cellular phones for NFP staff

line_items.name: Cellular phone
line_items.description: Capital cost of cellular phones for 4 NFP staff members
line_items.references: Assumes 4 staff share duty of supporting communications for NFP functions on a 24/7/365 basis. Default costs: average regional cost per smartphone at https://www.statista.com/statistics/283334/global-average-selling-price-smartphones/
line_items.where_find_base_cost: Smartphone/mobile phone costs: determine local per handset costs based on market data from local mobile phone providers and adjust the base multipler (number of phones) to reflect number of NFP duty officers.
line_items.description_fr: Coût initial des téléphones mobiles pour 4 membres du personnel du PFN
line_items.description_en: Capital cost of cellular phones for 4 NFP staff members
line_items.function_tag_fr: Opérations / mise en œuvre
line_items.references_fr: Présumer que 4 membres du personnel partagent le devoir de soutenir les communications pour les fonctions du PFN 24/7/365. Coûts par défaut: coût régional moyen par smartphone à <https://www.statista.com/statistics/283334/global-average-selling-price-smartphones/>
line_items.references_en: Assumes 4 staff share duty of supporting communications for NFP functions on a 24/7/365 basis. Default costs: average regional cost per smartphone at https://www.statista.com/statistics/283334/global-average-selling-price-smartphones/
line_items.where_find_base_cost_fr: Coûts des smartphones et des téléphones portables: déterminer les coûts locaux par appareil sur la base des données de marché fournies par les fournisseurs de téléphonie mobile locaux et ajuster le multiplicateur de base (nombre de téléphones) pour refléter le nombre d'agents de service du PFN.
line_items.where_find_base_cost_en: Smartphone/mobile phone costs: determine local per handset costs based on market data from local mobile phone providers and adjust the base multipler (number of phones) to reflect number of NFP duty officers.

line_items.name: Cellular and data plan
line_items.description: Cellular and data plans for 4 NFP staff members
line_items.references: Assumes 4 staff share duty of answering calls to NFP on a 24/7/365 basis. Default: average regional costs per smartphone user from ITU  (http://www.itu.int/en/ITU-D/Statistics/Documents/publications/misr2016/MISR2016-w4.pdf).
line_items.where_find_base_cost: Smartphone/mobile phone usage costs: determine local data/SMS/voice plan costs based on market data from local mobile phone service providers and adjust the base multipler (number of phones) to reflect number of NFP duty officers.
line_items.description_fr: Forfait données mobiles pour 4 membres du personnel du PFN
line_items.description_en: Cellular and data plans for 4 NFP staff members
line_items.function_tag_fr: Opérations / mise en œuvre
line_items.references_fr: Présumer que 4 membres du personnel partagent le devoir de répondre aux appels du PNF 24/7/365. Valeur par défaut: coûts régionaux moyens par utilisateur de smartphone de l'UIT (<http://www.itu.int/en/ITU-D/Statistics/Documents/publications/misr2016/MISR2016-w4.pdf>).
line_items.references_en: Assumes 4 staff share duty of answering calls to NFP on a 24/7/365 basis. Default: average regional costs per smartphone user from ITU  (http://www.itu.int/en/ITU-D/Statistics/Documents/publications/misr2016/MISR2016-w4.pdf).
line_items.where_find_base_cost_fr: Coûts d'utilisation des smartphones / téléphones mobiles: déterminer les coûts des forfaits pour données locales / SMS / vocal en fonction des données de marché des fournisseurs locaux de services de téléphonie mobile et ajuster le multiplicateur de base (nombre de téléphones) pour refléter le nombre d'agents de service du PFN.
line_items.where_find_base_cost_en: Smartphone/mobile phone usage costs: determine local data/SMS/voice plan costs based on market data from local mobile phone service providers and adjust the base multipler (number of phones) to reflect number of NFP duty officers.

line_items.name: Meeting expenditures
line_items.description: Expenses for 2 medium-sized annual, 1-day national meetings of a multisectoral taskforce to review sector-specific policies related to IHR implementation. Includes facility rental, stationary, refreshments, and other incidentals.
line_items.references: Equivalent of 2 half-day workshops including paid conference venue, refreshments and stationery. Assume MEDIUM NATIONAL meeting (see worksheet).  Default = 2 medium meetings at $1000/half-day meeting.
line_items.where_find_base_cost: Conference costs: determine per person costs for half-day workshop based on local conference rates (refreshments, stationery, incidentals, and venue) at NATIONAL LEVEL. Multiply by the number of participants to determine the per workshop cost, and adjust the base multiplier (number of workshops) as needed.
line_items.description_fr: Frais pour 2 réunions nationales annuelles de moyenne envergure d'un groupe de travail multisectoriel pour examiner les politiques sectorielles liées à la mise en œuvre du RSI. Comprend la location d'installations, la papeterie, les rafraîchissements et autres frais accessoires.
line_items.description_en: Expenses for 2 medium-sized annual, 1-day national meetings of a multisectoral taskforce to review sector-specific policies related to IHR implementation. Includes facility rental, stationary, refreshments, and other incidentals.

line_items.references_en: Equivalent of 2 half-day workshops including paid conference venue, refreshments and stationery. Assume MEDIUM NATIONAL meeting (see worksheet).  Default = 2 medium meetings at $1000/half-day meeting.

actions.name: Strengthen support for domestic IHR implementation

inputs.name: Hold regular multisectoral committee workshops with senior decision makers for outreach

line_items.name: Workshop expenditures
line_items.description: Expenses for large annual 1-day workshop for IHR coordination body to meet with senior decision makers to increase awareness of IHR requirements. Includes facility rental, stationary, refreshments, and other incidentals.
line_items.references: Equivalent of 2 full-day workshops including paid conference venue, refreshments and stationery. Assume LARGE NATIONAL meeting (see worksheet).  Default = 2 medium meetings at $1000/half-day meeting. ALTERNATE: multiple high-level meetings with individual ministries/leaders.
line_items.where_find_base_cost: Conference costs: determine per person costs for full-day workshop based on local conference rates (refreshments, stationery, incidentals, and venue) at NATIONAL LEVEL. Multiply by the number of participants to determine the per workshop cost, and adjust the base multiplier (number of workshops) as needed.
line_items.description_fr: Frais d'organisation d'un grand atelier annuel d'une journée pour permettre à l'organe de coordination du RSI de rencontrer des décideurs de haut niveau afin de mieux faire connaître les exigences du RSI. Comprend la location d'installations, la papeterie, les rafraîchissements et autres frais accessoires.
line_items.description_en: Expenses for large annual 1-day workshop for IHR coordination body to meet with senior decision makers to increase awareness of IHR requirements. Includes facility rental, stationary, refreshments, and other incidentals.
line_items.function_tag_fr: Coordination / leadership
line_items.references_fr: Équivalent de 2 ateliers d'une journée comprenant un lieu de conférence payant, des rafraîchissements et de la papeterie. Supposer une réunion NATIONALE IMPORTANTE (voir fiche de travail). Par défaut = 2 réunions moyennes à 1000 $ / réunion d'une demi-journée. AUTRE CHOIX: plusieurs réunions de haut niveau avec des ministères / leaders individuels.
line_items.references_en: Equivalent of 2 full-day workshops including paid conference venue, refreshments and stationery. Assume LARGE NATIONAL meeting (see worksheet).  Default = 2 medium meetings at $1000/half-day meeting. ALTERNATE: multiple high-level meetings with individual ministries/leaders.

actions.name_en: Strengthen support for domestic IHR implementation

indicators.name_fr: Un mécanisme fonctionnel est établi pour la coordination et l'intégration des secteurs concernés dans la mise en œuvre du RSI
indicators.name_en: A functional mechanism is established for the coordination and integration of relevant sectors in the implementation of IHR

score_descriptions_fr.1: Le mécanisme de coordination entre les ministères concernés n'est pas en place
score_descriptions_fr.2: Un mécanisme de coordination entre les ministères concernés est en place. Il existe des procédures opérationnelles normalisées (PON) nationales ou équivalent pour la coordination entre le point focal national RSI et les secteurs pertinents
score_descriptions_fr.3: Un organisme multisectoriel et multidisciplinaire, un comité ou un groupe de travail répondant aux exigences du RSI en matière de surveillance et d'intervention en cas d'urgences de santé publique d'envergure nationale et internationale est en place et a participé au dernier événement
score_descriptions_fr.4: Les mécanismes de coordination et de communication multisectoriels et multidisciplinaires sont testés et mis à jour régulièrement au moyen d'exercices ou lors d'un événement réel. Un plan d'action est élaboré pour incorporer les enseignements tirés des mécanismes de coordination et de communication multisectoriels et multidisciplinaires
score_descriptions_fr.5: Mises à jour annuelles sur l'état d'avancement de la mise en œuvre du RSI auprès des parties prenantes de tous les secteurs concernés

score_descriptions_en.1: Coordination mechanism between relevant ministries is not in place
score_descriptions_en.2: Coordination mechanism between relevant ministries is in place. National Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) or equivalent exists for the coordination between IHR NFP and relevant sectors
score_descriptions_en.3: A multisectoral, multidisciplinary body, committee or taskforce addressing IHR requirements on surveillance and response for public health emergencies of national and international concern is in place and participated in latest event
score_descriptions_en.4: Multisectoral and multidisciplinary coordination and communication mechanisms are tested and updated regularly through exercises or through the occurrence of an actual event. Action plan developed to incorporate lessons learnt of multisectoral and multidisciplinary coordination and communication mechanisms
score_descriptions_en.5: Annual updates on the status of IHR implementation to stakeholders across all relevant sectors conducted

capacities.name_fr: Coordination, communication et plaidoyer en matière de RSI
capacities.target_description_fr: La mise en œuvre effective du RSI (2005) requiert des approches multisectorielles / multidisciplinaires à travers des partenariats nationaux pour des systèmes d'alerte et d'intervention efficaces. La coordination des ressources nationales, y compris le fonctionnement durable d'un point focal national RSI (PFN), qui est un centre national pour les communications du RSI (2005), est une condition essentielle pour la mise en œuvre du RSI (2005). Le PFN devrait être accessible en tous temps pour communiquer avec les points de contact régionaux du RSI de l'OMS, et avec tous les secteurs concernés et autres parties prenantes dans le pays. Les États parties devraient fournir à l'OMS les coordonnées des points focaux nationaux, les mettre à jour en permanence et les confirmer chaque année.
capacities.target_description_en: The effective implementation of the IHR (2005) requires multisectoral/multidisciplinary approaches through national partnerships for effective alert and response systems. Coordination of nationwide resources, including the sustainable functioning of a National IHR Focal Point (NFP), which is a national centre for IHR (2005) communications, is a key requisite for IHR (2005) implementation. The NFP should be accessible at all times to communicate with the WHO IHR Regional Contact Points and with all relevant sectors and other stakeholders in the country. States Parties should provide WHO with contact details of NFPs, continuously update and annually confirm them.
capacities.desired_impact_fr: Un mécanisme de coordination multisectorielle / multidisciplinaire, de communication et de partenariat est fonctionnel pour détecter, évaluer et intervenir à tout événement ou risque de santé publique. Le PFN est accessible en tout temps pour communiquer avec les points de contact régionaux du RSI de l'OMS, et avec tous les secteurs concernés et autres parties prenantes dans le pays.
capacities.desired_impact_en: A mechanism for multisectoral/multidisciplinary coordination, communication and partnerships is functional to detect, assess and respond to any public health event or risk. The NFP is accessible at all times to communicate with the WHO IHR Regional Contact Points and with all relevant sectors and other stakeholders in the country.
capacities.notes_fr: Des informations supplémentaires peuvent être utilisées à partir des indicateurs suivants: D.3.1 Système de notification efficace à l'OMS, à la FAO et à l'OIE. D.3.2 Réseau et protocoles de notification dans le pays. R.3.1 Autorités chargées de la santé publique et de la sécurité (par exemple, l'application de la loi, le contrôle des frontières et les douanes sont liés lors d'un événement biologique suspect ou confirmé).
capacities.notes_en: Additional information can be used from following indicators: D.3.1 System for efficient reporting to WHO, FAO and OIE. D.3.2 Reporting network and protocols in country. R.3.1 Public Health and Security Authorities, (e.g. Law Enforcement, Border Control, Customs are linked during a suspect or confirmed biological event).

capacities.name: Antimicrobial Resistance (AMR)
capacities.target_description: Support work being coordinated by WHO, FAO, and OIE to develop an integrated global package of activities to combat antimicrobial resistance, spanning human, animal, agricultural, food and environmental aspects (i.e. a one-health approach), including: a) Each country has its own national comprehensive plan to combat antimicrobial resistance; b) Strengthen surveillance and laboratory capacity at the national and international level following agreed international standards developed in the framework of the Global Action plan, considering existing standards and; c) Improved conservation of existing treatments and collaboration to support the sustainable development of new antibiotics, alternative treatments, preventive measures and rapid, point-of-care diagnostics, including systems to preserve new antibiotics. As Measured by: (1)Number of comprehensive plans to combat antimicrobial resistance agreed and implemented at a national level, and yearly reporting against progress towards implementation at the international level. (2)Number of countries actively participating in a twinning framework, with countries agreeing to assist other countries in developing and implementing comprehensive activities to combat antimicrobial resistance, including use of support provided by international bodies to improve the monitoring of antimicrobial usage and resistance in humans and animals.
capacities.desired_impact: Decisive and comprehensive action to enhance infection prevention and control activities to prevent the emergence and spread of AMR, especially among drug-resistant bacteria. Nations will strengthen surveillance and laboratory capacity; ensure uninterrupted access to essential antibiotics of assured quality; regulate and promote the rational use of antibiotics in human medicine and in animal husbandry and other fields as appropriate; and support existing initiatives to foster innovations in science and technology for the development of new antimicrobial agents.
capacities.notes: Priority AMR pathogens may include some, all, or more than the seven selected pathogens listed by the World Health Organization (E. coli, K. pneumonia, S. aureus, S. pneumoniae, Salmonella spp., Shigella spp, N. gonorrheae). Other priority pathogens may be added by national authorities based on country needs including Mycobacterium tuberculosis. The number of designated laboratories for AMR detection/reporting, sentinel sites for surveillance of infections caused by AMR pathogens, facilities for IPC programs, and centres for antimicrobial stewardship will be decided by national authorities. Detection of AMR should occur by recommended standards such as CLSI or EUCAST. Each activity should occur in both veterinary and human sectors. The scope of activities in these two sectors should be decided by national authorities. Healthcare associated infection prevention and control programs might include training, audit and feedback components for personnel in addition to environmental controls such as disinfection and waste management. Antimicrobial stewardship might include uninterrupted access to high-quality medicines to treat bacterial infections, measurements of antibiotic use, regular updates to local antibiograms to inform empiric treatment of infections, and audit-feedback to prescribers of antibiotics to encourage appropriate use.

score_descriptions.4: Designated laboratories have conducted detection and reporting of all priority AMR pathogens for at least one year

Supposer une réunion PETITE DE NIVEAU INTERMEDIAIRE 1  (voir fiche de travail) et que la formation se déroule en laboratoire avec les coûts d'organisation = coûts des consommables. Par défaut = 1 petite réunion à 600 $ / jour de réunion x 5 jours.
line_items.references_en: Equivalent of 5-day workshop including paid conference venue, refreshments and stationery. Assume SMALL INTERMEDIATE 1 LEVEL meeting (see worksheet) and that training takes place in lab with venue costs = consumables costs. Default = 1 small meeting at $600/meeting day x 5 days.
line_items.where_find_base_cost_fr: Coûts de conférence: déterminer les coûts par personne pour un atelier d'une journée basé sur les tarifs des conférences locales (rafraîchissements, papeterie, frais accessoires et salle) au NIVEAU INTERMÉDIAIRE 1. Multiplier par le nombre de participants pour déterminer le coût par atelier par jour, et ajuster le multiplicateur de base (nombre de jours d'atelier) selon les besoins.
line_items.where_find_base_cost_en: Conference costs: determine per person costs for full-day workshop based on local conference rates (refreshments, stationery, incidentals, and venue) at INTERMEDIATE 1 LEVEL. Multiply by the number of participants to determine the per workshop cost per day, and adjust the base multiplier (number of workshop days) as needed.

line_items.name: Training workshop per diems
line_items.description: Per diems for annual 5-day training for each of 10 sentinel sites on SOPs  for laboratory testing and reporting of WHO priority pathogens
line_items.references: Equivalent to intermediate 1 level daily travel allowance (at domestic rate) for 2 trainers per site x 5-day annual workshop at each site. Assumes that training takes place in-service with no per diem for trainees. Default per diem = $80 per person per day, based on WHO-CHOICE National-Level Per Diem in USD2017.
line_items.where_find_base_cost: Per diem: use daily rates set by national regulations OR use WHO/UN rates (http://apps.who.int/bfi/tsy/PerDiem.aspx) or WHO-CHOICE rates and adjust the base multiplier (number of participants eligible for per diem x number of days) as needed.
line_items.name_fr: Per diem pour atelier de formation
line_items.description_fr: Per diem pour la formation annuelle de cinq jours pour chacun des 10 sites sentinelles sur les PON pour les tests en laboratoire et la notification des pathogènes prioritaires de l'OMS
line_items.description_en: Per diems for annual 5-day training for each of 10 sentinel sites on SOPs  for laboratory testing and reporting of WHO priority pathogens
line_items.function_tag_fr: Opérations / mise en œuvre
line_items.references_fr: Équivalent au per diem de déplacement de niveau intermédiaire (au tarif local) pour 2 formateurs par site x Atelier annuel de 5 jours sur chaque site. Suppose que la formation se déroule en interne sans indemnité journalière pour les stagiaires. Per diem par défaut = 80 $ par personne et par jour, basé sur le per diem de niveau national WHO-CHOICE en USD2017.
line_items.references_en: Equivalent to intermediate 1 level daily travel allowance (at domestic rate) for 2 trainers per site x 5-day annual workshop at each site. Assumes that training takes place in-service with no per diem for trainees. Default per diem = $80 per person per day, based on WHO-CHOICE National-Level Per Diem in USD2017.
line_items.where_find_base_cost_fr: Per diem: utiliser les taux quotidiens fixés par les réglementations nationales OU utiliser les taux OMS / ONU (<http://apps.who.int/bfi/tsy/PerDiem.aspx>) ou les taux WHO-CHOICE et ajuster le multiplicateur de base (nombre de participants admissibles à un nombre quotidien de jours) selon au besoin.
line_items.where_find_base_cost_en: Per diem: use daily rates set by national regulations OR use WHO/UN rates (http://apps.who.int/bfi/tsy/PerDiem.aspx) or WHO-CHOICE rates and adjust the base multiplier (number of participants eligible for per diem x number of days) as needed.

indicators.name_fr: Détection de la résistance aux antimicrobiens (RAM)
indicators.name_en: Antimicrobial resistance (AMR) detection

score_descriptions_fr.1: Aucun plan national de détection et de notification des agents pathogènes prioritaires de la RAM n'a été approuvé
score_descriptions_fr.2: Un plan national de détection et de déclaration des agents pathogènes prioritaires de la RAM a été approuvé
score_descriptions_fr.3: Les laboratoires désignés procèdent à la détection et à la déclaration de certains agents pathogènes RAM prioritaires
score_descriptions_fr.4: Les laboratoires désignés ont procédé à la détection et à la déclaration de tous les agents pathogènes RAM prioritaires pendant au moins un an
score_descriptions_fr.5: Des laboratoires désignés ont procédé à la détection et à la déclaration de tous les agents pathogènes RAM prioritaires pendant cinq ans grâce à un système d'amélioration continue

score_descriptions_en.1: No national plan for detection and reporting of priority AMR pathogens has been approved
score_descriptions_en.2: National plan for detection and reporting of priority AMR pathogens has been approved
score_descriptions_en.3: Designated laboratories are conducting detection and reporting of some priority AMR pathogens
score_descriptions_en.4: Designated laboratories have conducted detection and reporting of all priority AMR pathogens for at least one year
score_descriptions_en.5: Designated laboratories have conducted detection and reporting of all priority AMR pathogens for five years with a system for continuous improvement

indicators.name: Surveillance of infections caused by AMR pathogens

score_descriptions.1: No national plan for surveillance of infections caused by priority AMR pathogens has been approved
score_descriptions.2: National plan for surveillance of infections caused by priority AMR pathogens has been approved
score_descriptions.3: Designated sentinel sites are conducting surveillance of infections caused by some priority AMR pathogens
score_descriptions.4: Designated sentinel sites have conducted surveillance of infections caused by all priority AMR pathogens for at least one year
score_descriptions.5: Designated sentinel sites have conducted surveillance of infections caused by all priority AMR pathogens for five years with a system for continuous improvement

actions.name: Develop and implement national AMR surveillance guidance and an action plan

inputs.name: Hold multi-sectoral meetings to develop guidance and plan

line_items.name: National meeting expenditures
line_items.description: Expenses for 4 small, 1-day meetings of national coordinating committee to develop national AMR surveillance guidance. Includes facility rental, stationary, refreshments, and other incidentals.
line_items.function_tag: Planning including assessment, design, planning, policy, legislation
line_items.references: Equivalent of 4 full-day workshops including paid conference venue, refreshments and stationery. Assume SMALL NATIONAL meeting (see worksheet).  Default = 4 small meetings at $600/meeting.
line_items.where_find_base_cost: Conference costs: determine per person costs for full-day workshop based on local conference rates (refreshments, stationery, incidentals, and venue) at NATIONAL LEVEL. Multiply by the number of participants to determine the per workshop cost, and adjust the base multiplier (number of workshops) as needed.
line_items.description_fr: Dépenses pour 4 petites réunions d'un jour du comité national de coordination pour élaborer des directives nationales sur la surveillance de la résistance aux antimicrobiens. Comprend la location d'installations, la papeterie, les rafraîchissements et autres frais accessoires.
line_items.description_en: Expenses for 4 small, 1-day meetings of national coordinating committee to develop national AMR surveillance guidance. Includes facility rental, stationary, refreshments, and other incidentals.
line_items.function_tag_fr: Planification incluant l'évaluation, la conception, la planification, la réglementation, la législation
line_items.function_tag_en: Planning including assessment, design, planning, policy, legislation
line_items.references_fr: Équivalent de 4 ateliers d'une journée comprenant un lieu de conférence payant, des rafraîchissements et de la papeterie. Présumer une réunion NATIONALE PETITE (voir fiche de travail). Par défaut = 4 petites réunions à 600 $ / réunion.
line_items.references_en: Equivalent of 4 full-day workshops including paid conference venue, refreshments and stationery. Assume SMALL NATIONAL meeting (see worksheet).  Default = 4 small meetings at $600/meeting.
line_items.where_find_base_cost_fr: Coûts de conférence: déterminer les coûts par personne pour un atelier d'une journée basé sur les tarifs des conférences locales (rafraîchissements, papeterie, frais accessoires et salle) au NIVEAU NATIONAL. Multiplier par le nombre de participants pour déterminer le coût par atelier, et ajuster le multiplicateur de base (nombre d'ateliers) selon les besoins.
line_items.where_find_base_cost_en: Conference costs: determine per person costs for full-day workshop based on local conference rates (refreshments, stationery, incidentals, and venue) at NATIONAL LEVEL. Multiply by the number of participants to determine the per workshop cost, and adjust the base multiplier (number of workshops) as needed.

line_items.name: National meeting per diems
line_items.description: Per diems for 4 small, 1-day meetings of national coordinating committee to develop national AMR surveillance guidance.
line_items.function_tag: Planning including assessment, design, planning, policy, legislation
line_items.references: Equivalent of 4 half-day workshops (including paid conference venue, refreshments, stationery, and incidentals) per sentinel site. Assume SMALL INTERMEDIATE 1 LEVEL meeting (see worksheet).  Default = 4 small meetings at $262.50/meeting.
line_items.where_find_base_cost: Per site costs: determine per person costs for half-day workshop based on local conference rates (refreshments, stationery, incidentals, and venue) at INTERMEDIATE 1 LEVEL. Multiply by the number of participants to determine the per workshop cost and multiple times the number of workshops to determine the annual cost per sentinel site. Adjust the base multiplier (number of sentinel sites).
line_items.description_fr: Per diem pour 4 petites réunions d'un jour du comité national de coordination pour élaborer des directives nationales sur la surveillance de la résistance aux antimicrobiens.
line_items.description_en: Per diems for 4 small, 1-day meetings of national coordinating committee to develop national AMR surveillance guidance.
line_items.function_tag_fr: Planification incluant l'évaluation, la conception, la planification, la réglementation, la législation
line_items.function_tag_en: Planning including assessment, design, planning, policy, legislation
line_items.references_fr: Équivalent de 4 ateliers d'une demi-journée (incluant le lieu de la conférence payant les rafraîchissements, la papeterie et les frais accessoires) par site sentinelle. Présumer une réunion PETITE DE NIVEAU INTERMEDIAIRE 1 (voir fiche de travail). Par défaut = 4 petites réunions à 262,50 $ / réunion.
line_items.references_en: Equivalent of 4 half-day workshops (including paid conference venue, refreshments, stationery, and incidentals) per sentinel site. Assume SMALL INTERMEDIATE 1 LEVEL meeting (see worksheet).  Default = 4 small meetings at $262.50/meeting.
line_items.where_find_base_cost_fr: Coûts par site: déterminer les coûts par personne pour l'atelier d'une demi-journée en fonction des tarifs des conférences locales (rafraîchissements, papeterie, frais accessoires et salle) au NIVEAU INTERMÉDIAIRE 1. Multiplier par le nombre de participants pour déterminer le coût par atelier et plusieurs fois le nombre d'ateliers pour déterminer le coût annuel par site sentinelle. Ajuster le multiplicateur de base (nombre de sites sentinelles).
line_items.where_find_base_cost_en: Per site costs: determine per person costs for half-day workshop based on local conference rates (refreshments, stationery, incidentals, and venue) at INTERMEDIATE 1 LEVEL. Multiply by the number of participants to determine the per workshop cost and multiple times the number of workshops to determine the annual cost per sentinel site. Adjust the base multiplier (number of sentinel sites).

line_items.description: Annual, 1-day medium-sized trainings at each of 10 sentinel sites on SOPs for surveillance of WHO priority pathogens. Includes facility rental, stationary, refreshments, and other incidentals.
line_items.references: Equivalent of 1 full-day workshop per sentinel site including paid conference venue, refreshments and stationery. Assume MEDIUM INTERMEDIATE 1 LEVEL meeting (see worksheet). Default = 1 medium meeting at $875/meeting x 10 sites.
line_items.where_find_base_cost: Conference costs: determine per person costs for full-day workshop based on local conference rates (refreshments, stationery, incidentals, and venue) at INTERMEDIATE 1 LEVEL. Multiply by the number of participants to determine the cost of the workshop per sentinel site and adjust the base multiplier (number of sites) as needed.
line_items.description_fr: Des formations annuelles de taille moyenne d'une journée dans chacun des 10 sites sentinelles sur les PON pour la surveillance des pathogènes prioritaires de l'OMS. Comprend la location d'installations, la papeterie, les rafraîchissements et autres frais accessoires.
line_items.description_en: Annual, 1-day medium-sized trainings at each of 10 sentinel sites on SOPs for surveillance of WHO priority pathogens. Includes facility rental, stationary, refreshments, and other incidentals.
line_items.function_tag_fr: Opérations / mise en œuvre
line_items.references_fr: Équivalent d'un atelier d'une journée par site sentinelle incluant le lieu de conférence payant, les rafraîchissements et la papeterie. Présumer une réunion MOYENNE DE NIVEAU INTERMÉDIAIRE 1 (voir fiche de travail). Par défaut = 1 réunion moyenne à 875 $ / réunion x 10 sites.
line_items.references_en: Equivalent of 1 full-day workshop per sentinel site including paid conference venue, refreshments and stationery. Assume MEDIUM INTERMEDIATE 1 LEVEL meeting (see worksheet). Default = 1 medium meeting at $875/meeting x 10 sites.
line_items.where_find_base_cost_fr: Coûts de conférence: déterminer les coûts par personne pour un atelier d'une journée basé sur les tarifs des conférences locales (rafraîchissements, papeterie, frais accessoires et salle) au NIVEAU INTERMÉDIAIRE 1. Multiplier par le nombre de participants pour déterminer le coût de l'atelier par site sentinelle et ajuster le multiplicateur de base (nombre de sites) selon les besoins.
line_items.where_find_base_cost_en: Conference costs: determine per person costs for full-day workshop based on local conference rates (refreshments, stationery, incidentals, and venue) at INTERMEDIATE 1 LEVEL. Multiply by the number of participants to determine the cost of the workshop per sentinel site and adjust the base multiplier (number of sites) as needed.

line_items.name: Training per diems
line_items.description: Per diems for annual, 1-day medium-sized trainings at each of 10 sentinel sites on SOPs for surveillance of WHO priority pathogens
line_items.references: Equivalent to intermediate 1 level daily travel allowance (at domestic rate) for 2 trainers per site x 1 full-day annual workshop at each site. Assumes that training takes place in-service with no per diem for trainees. Default per diem = $80 per person per day, based on WHO-CHOICE National-Level Per Diem in USD2017.
line_items.where_find_base_cost: Per diem: use daily rates set by national regulations OR use WHO/UN rates (http://apps.who.int/bfi/tsy/PerDiem.aspx) or WHO-CHOICE rates and adjust the base multiplier (number of participants eligible for per diem x number of days) as needed.
line_items.description_fr: Per diem pour des formations annuelles de taille moyenne d'une journée dans chacun des 10 sites sentinelles sur les PON pour la surveillance des pathogènes prioritaires de l'OMS
line_items.description_en: Per diems for annual, 1-day medium-sized trainings at each of 10 sentinel sites on SOPs for surveillance of WHO priority pathogens
line_items.function_tag_fr: Opérations / mise en œuvre
line_items.references_fr: Équivalent au per diem de déplacement de niveau intermédiaire (au tarif local) pour 2 formateurs par site x 1 atelier annuel d'une journée complète sur chaque site. Suppose que la formation se déroule en interne sans per diem pour les participants. Per diem par défaut = 80 $ par personne et par jour, basé sur l'allocation journalière de niveau national WHO-CHOICE en USD2017.
line_items.references_en: Equivalent to intermediate 1 level daily travel allowance (at domestic rate) for 2 trainers per site x 1 full-day annual workshop at each site. Assumes that training takes place in-service with no per diem for trainees. Default per diem = $80 per person per day, based on WHO-CHOICE National-Level Per Diem in USD2017.
line_items.where_find_base_cost_fr: Per diem: utiliser les taux quotidiens fixés par les réglementations nationales OU utiliser les taux OMS / ONU (<http://apps.who.int/bfi/tsy/PerDiem.aspx>) ou les taux WHO-CHOICE et ajuster le multiplicateur de base (nombre de participants admissibles à un nombre quotidien de jours) selon au besoin.
line_items.where_find_base_cost_en: Per diem: use daily rates set by national regulations OR use WHO/UN rates (http://apps.who.int/bfi/tsy/PerDiem.aspx) or WHO-CHOICE rates and adjust the base multiplier (number of participants eligible for per diem x number of days) as needed.

indicators.name_fr: Surveillance des infections causées par des agents pathogènes de la RAM
indicators.name_en: Surveillance of infections caused by AMR pathogens

score_descriptions_fr.1: Aucun plan national de surveillance des infections causées par des pathogènes prioritaires de la RAM n'a été approuvé
score_descriptions_fr.2: Le plan national de surveillance des infections causées par des agents pathogènes prioritaires de la RAM a été approuvé
score_descriptions_fr.3: Les sites sentinelles désignés surveillent les infections causées par certains agents pathogènes prioritaires de la RAM
score_descriptions_fr.4: Les sites sentinelles désignés ont surveillé les infections causées par tous les agents pathogènes prioritaires de la RAM pendant au moins un an
score_descriptions_fr.5: Les sites sentinelles désignés ont surveillé les infections causées par tous les agents pathogènes prioritaires de la RAM pendant cinq ans grâce à un système d'amélioration continue.

score_descriptions_en.1: No national plan for surveillance of infections caused by priority AMR pathogens has been approved
score_descriptions_en.2: National plan for surveillance of infections caused by priority AMR pathogens has been approved
score_descriptions_en.3: Designated sentinel sites are conducting surveillance of infections caused by some priority AMR pathogens
score_descriptions_en.4: Designated sentinel sites have conducted surveillance of infections caused by all priority AMR pathogens for at least one year
score_descriptions_en.5: Designated sentinel sites have conducted surveillance of infections caused by all priority AMR pathogens for five years with a system for continuous improvement

indicators.name: Healthcare associated infection (HCAI) prevention control programs

score_descriptions.1: No national plan for HCAI programs has been approved
score_descriptions.2: National plan for HCAI programs has been approved
score_descriptions.3: Designated facilities are conducting some HCAI programs
score_descriptions.4: Designated facilities have conducted all HCAI programs for at least one year
score_descriptions.5: Designated facilities have conducted all HCAI programs for five years with a system for continuous improvement

capacities.target_description_fr: Soutenir le travail coordonné par l'OMS, la FAO et l'OIE pour élaborer un ensemble mondial intégré d'activités de lutte contre la résistance aux antimicrobiens couvrant les aspects humains, animaux, agricoles, alimentaires et environnementaux (par ex. l'approche One Health), notamment: a) Chaque pays possède son propre plan national exhaustif de lutte contre la résistance aux antimicrobiens; b) Renforcer la capacité de surveillance et de laboratoire aux niveaux national et international, conformément aux normes internationales convenues élaborées dans le cadre du Plan d'action Mondial, en tenant compte des normes existantes et; c) Amélioration de la conservation des traitements existants et de la collaboration pour soutenir le développement durable de nouveaux antibiotiques, des traitements alternatifs, des mesures préventives et des diagnostics rapides sur le lieu de soins, y compris des systèmes pour préserver les nouveaux antibiotiques. Tel que mesuré par: (1) Nombre de plans mondiaux de lutte contre la résistance aux antimicrobiens acceptés et mis en œuvre au niveau national, et rapports annuels sur les progrès accomplis dans la mise en œuvre au niveau international. 2) Nombre de pays participant activement à un jumelage, les pays acceptant d'aider d'autres pays à élaborer et à mettre en œuvre des activités globales de lutte contre la résistance aux antimicrobiens, y compris le recours aux organismes internationaux pour améliorer la surveillance de l'utilisation des antimicrobiens et la résistance chez les humains et les animaux.
capacities.target_description_en: Support work being coordinated by WHO, FAO, and OIE to develop an integrated global package of activities to combat antimicrobial resistance, spanning human, animal, agricultural, food and environmental aspects (i.e. a one-health approach), including: a) Each country has its own national comprehensive plan to combat antimicrobial resistance; b) Strengthen surveillance and laboratory capacity at the national and international level following agreed international standards developed in the framework of the Global Action plan, considering existing standards and; c) Improved conservation of existing treatments and collaboration to support the sustainable development of new antibiotics, alternative treatments, preventive measures and rapid, point-of-care diagnostics, including systems to preserve new antibiotics. As Measured by: (1)Number of comprehensive plans to combat antimicrobial resistance agreed and implemented at a national level, and yearly reporting against progress towards implementation at the international level. (2)Number of countries actively participating in a twinning framework, with countries agreeing to assist other countries in developing and implementing comprehensive activities to combat antimicrobial resistance, including use of support provided by international bodies to improve the monitoring of antimicrobial usage and resistance in humans and animals.
capacities.desired_impact_fr: Action décisive et exhaustive pour renforcer les activités de prévention et de contrôle des infections afin de prévenir l'émergence et la propagation de la résistance aux antimicrobiens, en particulier chez les bactéries pharmacorésistantes. Les pays renforceront la surveillance et les capacités de laboratoire; assurent un accès ininterrompu aux antibiotiques essentiels de qualité garantie ; réglementent et font la promotion de l'utilisation rationnelle des antibiotiques en médecine humaine et dans l'élevage et dans d'autres domaines, selon le cas ; et soutiennent les initiatives existantes visant à favoriser les innovations scientifiques et technologiques pour le développement de nouveaux agents antimicrobiens.
capacities.desired_impact_en: Decisive and comprehensive action to enhance infection prevention and control activities to prevent the emergence and spread of AMR, especially among drug-resistant bacteria. Nations will strengthen surveillance and laboratory capacity; ensure uninterrupted access to essential antibiotics of assured quality; regulate and promote the rational use of antibiotics in human medicine and in animal husbandry and other fields as appropriate; and support existing initiatives to foster innovations in science and technology for the development of new antimicrobial agents.
capacities.notes_fr: Les agents pathogènes prioritaires de la RAM peuvent inclure certains, tous ou plus des sept pathogènes sélectionnés répertoriés par l'Organisation mondiale de la santé (E. coli, K. pneumonie, S. aureus, S. pneumoniae, Salmonella spp., Shigella spp, N. gonorrheae) . D'autres pathogènes prioritaires peuvent être ajoutés par les autorités nationales en fonction des besoins des pays, y compris Mycobacterium tuberculosis. Le nombre de laboratoires désignés pour la détection / notification de la résistance aux antimicrobiens, les sites sentinelles pour la surveillance des infections causées par les agents pathogènes de la RAM, les installations pour les programmes IPC et les centres de gestion des antimicrobiens seront décidés par les autorités nationales. La détection de RAM devrait se produire sous des normes recommandées telles que CLSI ou EUCAST. Chaque activité devrait avoir lieu dans les secteurs vétérinaire et humain. La portée des activités dans ces deux secteurs devrait être décidée par les autorités nationales. Les programmes de prévention et de contrôle des infections associés aux soins de santé peuvent comprendre des éléments de formation, de vérification et de rétroaction pour le personnel, en plus des contrôles environnementaux, comme la désinfection et la gestion des déchets. La gestion des antimicrobiens pourrait inclure un accès ininterrompu à des médicaments de qualité pour traiter les infections bactériennes, des mesures d'antibiothérapie, des mises à jour régulières des antibiogrammes locaux pour éclairer le traitement empirique des infections et une rétroaction d'audit aux prescripteurs d'antibiotiques pour encourager une utilisation appropriée.
capacities.notes_en: Priority AMR pathogens may include some, all, or more than the seven selected pathogens listed by the World Health Organization (E. coli, K. pneumonia, S. aureus, S. pneumoniae, Salmonella spp., Shigella spp, N. gonorrheae). Other priority pathogens may be added by national authorities based on country needs including Mycobacterium tuberculosis. The number of designated laboratories for AMR detection/reporting, sentinel sites for surveillance of infections caused by AMR pathogens, facilities for IPC programs, and centres for antimicrobial stewardship will be decided by national authorities. Detection of AMR should occur by recommended standards such as CLSI or EUCAST. Each activity should occur in both veterinary and human sectors. The scope of activities in these two sectors should be decided by national authorities. Healthcare associated infection prevention and control programs might include training, audit and feedback components for personnel in addition to environmental controls such as disinfection and waste management. Antimicrobial stewardship might include uninterrupted access to high-quality medicines to treat bacterial infections, measurements of antibiotic use, regular updates to local antibiograms to inform empiric treatment of infections, and audit-feedback to prescribers of antibiotics to encourage appropriate use.

capacities.name: Zoonotic Disease
capacities.target_description: Adopted measured behaviours, policies and/or practices that minimize the transmission of zoonotic diseases from animals into human populations.
capacities.as_measured_by: Identify the five zoonotic diseases/pathogens of greatest national public health concern and strengthen existing surveillance systems for prioritized zoonoses.
capacities.desired_impact: Implementation of guidance and models on behaviours, policies and practices to minimize the spill over, spread, and full emergence of zoonotic disease into or out of human populations prior to the development of efficient human-to-human transmission. Nations will develop and implement operational frameworks— based on international standards, guidelines, and successful existing models—that specify the actions necessary to promote One Health approaches to policies, practices and behaviours that could minimize the risk of zoonotic disease emergence and spread.
capacities.notes: The indicator refers to zoonotic disease surveillance capacity for the country. Surveillance systems for zoonotic disease should include: The system of surveillance for major zoonotic diseases covers 80% of level 3 administrative units in the country (to be considered “nationwide”); Regular reports to relevant authorities both in human and animal health leadership. Linkages between Ministry of Health, Ministry of Agriculture, and wildlife specialists to promote the sharing of information and data. Linkage should also exist on the regional and local level. The Ministry of Agriculture (or other relevant agency) can provide an accurate estimate of animal population within the country and within each administrative unit. Reports from OIE PVS pathway need to be used to inform the performance of veterinary services, including for the assessment of Workforce Development (Detect 4).

indicators.name: Surveillance systems in place for priority zoonotic diseases/pathogens

score_descriptions.1: No zoonotic surveillance systems exist
score_descriptions.2: Country has determined zoonotic diseases of greatest national public health concern but does not have animal zoonotic surveillance systems in place
score_descriptions.3: Zoonotic surveillance systems in place for 1-4 zoonotic diseases/ pathogens of greatest public health concern
score_descriptions.4: Zoonotic surveillance systems in place for five or more zoonotic diseases/ pathogens of greatest public health concern
score_descriptions.5: Zoonotic surveillance systems in place for five or more zoonotic diseases/ pathogens of greatest public health concern with system in place for continuous improvement

actions.name_en: Support regular review of surveillance system performance

indicators.name_fr: Systèmes de surveillance en place pour les maladies / agents pathogènes zoonotiques prioritaires
indicators.name_en: Surveillance systems in place for priority zoonotic diseases/pathogens

score_descriptions_fr.1: Aucun système de surveillance zoonotique n'existe
score_descriptions_fr.2: Le pays a déterminé les zoonoses les plus préoccupantes pour la santé publique nationale, mais n'a pas mis en place de système de surveillance zoonotique des animaux
score_descriptions_fr.3: Systèmes de surveillance zoonotique en place pour 1 à 4 zoonoses / agents pathogènes les plus préoccupants pour la santé publique
score_descriptions_fr.4: Systèmes de surveillance zoonotique mis en place pour cinq zoonoses ou agents pathogènes zoonotiques les plus préoccupants pour la santé publique
score_descriptions_fr.5: Systèmes de surveillance zoonotique mis en place pour cinq maladies ou agents zoonotiques ou plus préoccupants pour la santé publique, avec système en place pour l'amélioration continue

score_descriptions_en.1: No zoonotic surveillance systems exist
score_descriptions_en.2: Country has determined zoonotic diseases of greatest national public health concern but does not have animal zoonotic surveillance systems in place
score_descriptions_en.3: Zoonotic surveillance systems in place for 1-4 zoonotic diseases/ pathogens of greatest public health concern
score_descriptions_en.4: Zoonotic surveillance systems in place for five or more zoonotic diseases/ pathogens of greatest public health concern
score_descriptions_en.5: Zoonotic surveillance systems in place for five or more zoonotic diseases/ pathogens of greatest public health concern with system in place for continuous improvement

indicators.name: Veterinary or Animal Health Workforce

score_descriptions.1: Country has no animal health workforce capacity capable of conducting one health activities
score_descriptions.2: Country has animal health workforce capacity within the national public health system
score_descriptions.3: Animal health workforce capacity within the national public health system and less than half of sub-national levels
score_descriptions.4: Animal health workforce capacity within the national public health system and more than half of sub-national levels
score_descriptions.5: Animal health workforce capacity within the national public health system and at all sub-national levels. This includes a plan for animal health workforce continuing education

line_items.name: Salary
line_items.description: Annual salary for 1 national animal health worker with public health training per 500,000 country population
line_items.references: One veterinary/animal public health officer per 500,000 human population at national level.
line_items.where_find_base_cost: Based on salary estimate for mid-career veterinarian in Kenya, estimated at 120,000 KSH per month ($1155 USD). This value is comparable to "Other health workers" median salary ($12.15 per hour, corresponding to roughly $15,000 per year) in Tijdens et al (2013): doi:10.1186/1478-4491-11-11
line_items.description_fr: Salaire annuel pour 1 agent national de santé animale ayant suivi une formation en santé publique pour 500 000 habitants
line_items.description_en: Annual salary for 1 national animal health worker with public health training per 500,000 country population

line_items.where_find_base_cost_fr: Sur la base de l'estimation du salaire du vétérinaire à mi-carrière au Kenya, évalué à 120 000 KSH par mois (1 255 USD). Cette valeur est comparable au salaire médian «Autres agents de santé» (12,15 $ par heure, ce qui correspond à environ 15 000 $ par année) dans Tijdens et al (2013): doi: 10.1186 / 1478-4491-11-11
