line_items.function_tag_fr: Opérations / mise en œuvre
line_items.references_fr: Équivalent d'un atelier d'une journée comprenant un lieu de conférence payant, des rafraîchissements et de la papeterie. Présumer une réunion NATIONALE PETITE (voir fiche de travail). Par défaut = 1 petite réunion à 600 $ / réunion.
line_items.references_en: Equivalent of 1 full-day workshop including paid conference venue, refreshments and stationery. Assume SMALL NATIONAL meeting (see worksheet).  Default = 1 small meeting at $600/meeting.
line_items.where_find_base_cost_fr: Coûts de conférence: déterminer les coûts par personne pour un atelier d'une journée basé sur les tarifs des conférences locales (rafraîchissements, papeterie, frais accessoires et salle) au NIVEAU NATIONAL. Multiplier par le nombre de participants pour déterminer le coût par atelier, et ajuster le multiplicateur de base (nombre d'ateliers) selon les besoins.
line_items.where_find_base_cost_en: Conference costs: determine per person costs for full-day workshop based on local conference rates (refreshments, stationery, incidentals, and venue) at NATIONAL LEVEL. Multiply by the number of participants to determine the per workshop cost, and adjust the base multiplier (number of workshops) as needed.

inputs.name_fr: Tenir un atelier technique avec les parties prenantes pour développer un plan de formation

inputs.name: Provide detection and response training to animal health workforce

line_items.name: Trainer per diems
line_items.description: Per diem for 1 trainer to conduct annual 1-day joint One Health training programs for each intermediate and intermediate 2 area in information sharing and coordinated zoonotic disease detection and response
line_items.references: Equivalent to intermediate 1 and 2 level daily travel allowance (at domestic rate) for 1 trainer per site x 1 full-day annual workshop at each site. Assumes that training takes place in-service with no per diem for trainees. Default per diem = $80 per person per day, based on WHO-CHOICE National-Level Per Diem in USD2017.
line_items.where_find_base_cost: Per diem: use daily rates set by national regulations OR use WHO/UN rates (http://apps.who.int/bfi/tsy/PerDiem.aspx) or WHO-CHOICE rates and adjust the base multiplier (number of participants eligible for per diem x number of days) as needed.
line_items.description_fr: Per diem pour 1 formateur qui dirigera des programmes annuels de formation conjointe One Health d'une journée pour chaque zone intermédiaire et intermédiaire 2 en matière de partage d'informations et de détection coordonnée des zoonoses et d'intervention
line_items.description_en: Per diem for 1 trainer to conduct annual 1-day joint One Health training programs for each intermediate and intermediate 2 area in information sharing and coordinated zoonotic disease detection and response
line_items.function_tag_fr: Opérations / mise en œuvre
line_items.references_fr: Équivalent au per diem de déplacement de niveau 1 et 2 (au tarif local) pour 1 formateur par site x 1 atelier annuel d'une journée complète sur chaque site. Présumer que la formation se déroule en interne sans per diem pour les participants. Per diem par défaut = 80 $ par personne et par jour, basé sur le per diem de niveau national WHO-CHOICE en USD2017.
line_items.references_en: Equivalent to intermediate 1 and 2 level daily travel allowance (at domestic rate) for 1 trainer per site x 1 full-day annual workshop at each site. Assumes that training takes place in-service with no per diem for trainees. Default per diem = $80 per person per day, based on WHO-CHOICE National-Level Per Diem in USD2017.
line_items.where_find_base_cost_fr: Per diem: utiliser les taux quotidiens fixés par les réglementations nationales OU utiliser les taux OMS / ONU (<http://apps.who.int/bfi/tsy/PerDiem.aspx>) ou les taux WHO-CHOICE et ajuster le multiplicateur de base (nombre de participants admissibles à un nombre quotidien de jours) selon au besoin.
line_items.where_find_base_cost_en: Per diem: use daily rates set by national regulations OR use WHO/UN rates (http://apps.who.int/bfi/tsy/PerDiem.aspx) or WHO-CHOICE rates and adjust the base multiplier (number of participants eligible for per diem x number of days) as needed.

inputs.name_fr: Fournir une formation en détection et en intervention aux personnels de santé animale

actions.name_fr: Fournir une formation ciblée au personnel pour la santé animale
actions.name_en: Provide targeted training for animal health workforce

indicators.name_fr: Personnel de santé vétérinaire ou animale
indicators.name_en: Veterinary or Animal Health Workforce

score_descriptions_fr.1: Le pays n'a aucune capacité en personnel de santé animale capable de mener une activité sanitaire
score_descriptions_fr.2: Le pays dispose d'une capacité en personnel de santé animale au sein du système national de santé publique
score_descriptions_fr.3: Capacités des personnels de santé animale au sein du système national de santé publique, et dans au moins la moitié des niveaux infranationaux
score_descriptions_fr.4: Capacités des personnels de santé animale au sein du système national de santé publique et dans plus de la moitié des niveaux infranationaux
score_descriptions_fr.5: Capacités des personnels de santé animale au sein du système national de santé publique et à tous les niveaux infranationaux. Cela comprend un plan de formation continue des personnels de santé animale

score_descriptions_en.1: Country has no animal health workforce capacity capable of conducting one health activities
score_descriptions_en.2: Country has animal health workforce capacity within the national public health system
score_descriptions_en.3: Animal health workforce capacity within the national public health system and less than half of sub-national levels
score_descriptions_en.4: Animal health workforce capacity within the national public health system and more than half of sub-national levels
score_descriptions_en.5: Animal health workforce capacity within the national public health system and at all sub-national levels. This includes a plan for animal health workforce continuing education

indicators.name: Mechanisms for responding to infectious zoonoses and potential zoonoses are established and functional

score_descriptions.1: No mechanism in place
score_descriptions.2: National policy, strategy or plan for the response to zoonotic events is in place
score_descriptions.3: A mechanism for coordinated response to outbreaks of zoonotic diseases by human, animal and wildlife sectors is established
score_descriptions.4: Timely and systematic information exchange between animal/wildlife surveillance units, human health surveillance units and other relevant sectors in response to potential zoonotic risks and urgent zoonotic events
score_descriptions.5: Timely (as defined by national standards) response to more than 80% of zoonotic events of potential national and international concern

indicators.name_fr: Les mécanismes d'intervention aux zoonoses infectieuses et aux zoonoses potentielles sont établis et fonctionnels
indicators.name_en: Mechanisms for responding to infectious zoonoses and potential zoonoses are established and functional

score_descriptions_fr.1: Aucun mécanisme en place
score_descriptions_fr.2: Une politique nationale, une stratégie ou un plan pour l'intervention aux événements zoonotiques est en place
score_descriptions_fr.3: Un mécanisme d'intervention coordonnée aux épidémies de zoonoses par les humains, animaux ou la faune est établi
score_descriptions_fr.4: Échange d'informations opportun et systématique entre les unités de surveillance animale / faunique, les unités de surveillance de la santé humaine et d'autres secteurs pertinents en réponse aux risques zoonotiques potentiels et aux événements zoonotiques urgents
score_descriptions_fr.5: Une intervention rapide (telle que définie par les normes nationales) à plus de 80% des événements zoonotiques potentiellement préoccupants à l'échelle nationale et internationale

score_descriptions_en.1: No mechanism in place
score_descriptions_en.2: National policy, strategy or plan for the response to zoonotic events is in place
score_descriptions_en.3: A mechanism for coordinated response to outbreaks of zoonotic diseases by human, animal and wildlife sectors is established
score_descriptions_en.4: Timely and systematic information exchange between animal/wildlife surveillance units, human health surveillance units and other relevant sectors in response to potential zoonotic risks and urgent zoonotic events
score_descriptions_en.5: Timely (as defined by national standards) response to more than 80% of zoonotic events of potential national and international concern

capacities.target_description_fr: Comportements raisonnables adoptés, règlements et / ou pratiques qui minimisent la transmission des maladies zoonotiques des animaux vers les populations humaines.
capacities.target_description_en: Adopted measured behaviours, policies and/or practices that minimize the transmission of zoonotic diseases from animals into human populations.
capacities.as_measured_by_en: Identify the five zoonotic diseases/pathogens of greatest national public health concern and strengthen existing surveillance systems for prioritized zoonoses.
capacities.desired_impact_fr: Mise en œuvre de directives et de modèles sur les comportements, les politiques et les pratiques afin de minimiser le débordement, la propagation et l'émergence complète de la zoonose dans ou à partir des populations humaines avant le développement d'une transmission interhumaine efficace. Les pays élaboreront et mettront en œuvre des cadres opérationnels basés sur des normes internationales, des directives et des modèles existants qui précisent les actions nécessaires pour promouvoir des approches, des pratiques et des comportements One Health qui pourraient minimiser le risque d'émergence et de propagation des zoonoses.
capacities.desired_impact_en: Implementation of guidance and models on behaviours, policies and practices to minimize the spill over, spread, and full emergence of zoonotic disease into or out of human populations prior to the development of efficient human-to-human transmission. Nations will develop and implement operational frameworks— based on international standards, guidelines, and successful existing models—that specify the actions necessary to promote One Health approaches to policies, practices and behaviours that could minimize the risk of zoonotic disease emergence and spread.
capacities.notes_fr: L'indicateur fait référence à la capacité de surveillance des zoonoses dans le pays. Les systèmes de surveillance des zoonoses devraient inclure: un système de surveillance des principales zoonoses qui couvre 80% des unités administratives de niveau 3 dans le pays (à considérer à l'échelle nationale); des rapports réguliers aux autorités compétentes en matière de santé humaine et animale. Des liens entre le Ministère de la Santé, le Ministère de l'Agriculture et les spécialistes de la faune pour promouvoir le partage d'informations et de données. Un lien devrait également exister au niveau régional et local. Le ministère de l'Agriculture (ou un autre organisme pertinent) peut fournir une estimation précise de la population animale dans le pays, et au sein de chaque unité administrative. Les rapports de l'outil PSV de l'OIE doivent être utilisés pour informer sur les performances des services vétérinaires, y compris pour l'évaluation du développement des ressources humaines (Détection 4).
capacities.notes_en: The indicator refers to zoonotic disease surveillance capacity for the country. Surveillance systems for zoonotic disease should include: The system of surveillance for major zoonotic diseases covers 80% of level 3 administrative units in the country (to be considered “nationwide”); Regular reports to relevant authorities both in human and animal health leadership. Linkages between Ministry of Health, Ministry of Agriculture, and wildlife specialists to promote the sharing of information and data. Linkage should also exist on the regional and local level. The Ministry of Agriculture (or other relevant agency) can provide an accurate estimate of animal population within the country and within each administrative unit. Reports from OIE PVS pathway need to be used to inform the performance of veterinary services, including for the assessment of Workforce Development (Detect 4).

capacities.name: Food Safety
capacities.target_description: States Parties should have surveillance and response capacity for food and water borne disease risk or events. It requires effective communication and collaboration among the sectors responsible for food safety and safe water and sanitation.
capacities.desired_impact: Timely detection and effective response of potential food-related events in collaboration with other sectors responsible for food safety.
capacities.notes: Indicators refer to detection and responding to the food-related events and enabling environment for putting food safety control mechanism in place with appropriate legislation, laws, or policy and with the involvement of multiple sectors. Detection capacity includes surveillance but also the laboratory capacity required for the verification of any events.

indicators.name: Mechanisms are established and functioning for detecting and responding to foodborne disease and food contamination.

score_descriptions.1: No mechanism in place
score_descriptions.2: Focal points are identified in relevant stakeholders (food safety sector, human health sector, surveillance and response staffs, animal health sector, key laboratories)
score_descriptions.3: Operational links are established between surveillance and response staffs, food safety, animal health and laboratories
score_descriptions.4: Staff responsible for surveillance and response, food safety, laboratories and agriculture work together to consider the risks and interventions
score_descriptions.5: There is an effective (formal or informal) mechanism for rapid information exchange during suspected foodborne disease outbreak investigations between all the stakeholders / relevant sectors

line_items.name: Meeting expenditures
line_items.description: Annual expenses for 4 small, national 1-day meetings (routine and/or urgent) to update and implement information-sharing protocols. Includes facility rental, stationary, refreshments, and other incidentals.
line_items.function_tag: Planning including assessment, design, planning, policy, legislation
line_items.references: Equivalent of 4 full-day workshops including paid conference venue, refreshments and stationery. Assume SMALL NATIONAL meeting (see worksheet).  Default = 1 small meeting at $600/meeting -- assumes 4 routine or urgent meetings per year.
line_items.where_find_base_cost: Conference costs: determine per person costs for full-day workshop based on local conference rates (refreshments, stationery, incidentals, and venue) at NATIONAL LEVEL. Multiply by the number of participants to determine the per workshop cost, and adjust the base multiplier (number of workshops) as needed.
line_items.description_fr: Dépenses annuelles pour 4 petites réunions nationales d'une journée (de routine et / ou urgentes) pour mettre à jour et mettre en œuvre des protocoles de partage d'informations. Comprend la location d'installations, la papeterie, les rafraîchissements et autres frais accessoires.
line_items.description_en: Annual expenses for 4 small, national 1-day meetings (routine and/or urgent) to update and implement information-sharing protocols. Includes facility rental, stationary, refreshments, and other incidentals.

line_items.references_fr: Équivalent de 4 ateliers d'une journée comprenant un lieu de conférence payant, des rafraîchissements et de la papeterie. Présumer une réunion NATIONALE PETITE (voir fiche de travail). Par défaut = 1 petite réunion à 600 $ / réunion - présumer 4 réunions de routine ou urgentes par an.
line_items.references_en: Equivalent of 4 full-day workshops including paid conference venue, refreshments and stationery. Assume SMALL NATIONAL meeting (see worksheet).  Default = 1 small meeting at $600/meeting -- assumes 4 routine or urgent meetings per year.
line_items.where_find_base_cost_fr: Coûts de conférence: déterminer les coûts par personne pour un atelier d'une journée basé sur les tarifs des conférences locales (rafraîchissements, papeterie, frais accessoires et salle) au NIVEAU NATIONAL. Multiplier par le nombre de participants pour déterminer le coût par atelier, et ajuster le multiplicateur de base (nombre d'ateliers) selon les besoins.

indicators.name_fr: Des mécanismes sont établis et fonctionnent pour détecter et intervenir face aux maladies d'origine alimentaire et à la contamination des aliments.
indicators.name_en: Mechanisms are established and functioning for detecting and responding to foodborne disease and food contamination.

score_descriptions_fr.1: Aucun mécanisme en place
score_descriptions_fr.2: Les points focaux sont identifiés dans les parties prenantes concernées (secteur de la sécurité alimentaire, secteur de la santé humaine, personnel de surveillance et d'intervention, secteur de la santé animale, laboratoires clés)
score_descriptions_fr.3: Des liens opérationnels sont établis entre le personnel de surveillance et d'intervention, la sécurité alimentaire, la santé animale et les laboratoires.
score_descriptions_fr.4: Le personnel responsable de la surveillance et de l'intervention, de la salubrité des aliments, des laboratoires et de l'agriculture travaillent de concert pour évaluer les risques et les interventions
score_descriptions_fr.5: Il existe un mécanisme efficace (formel ou informel) pour un échange rapide d'informations lors des enquêtes sur les épidémies de maladies d'origine alimentaire suspectées entre toutes les parties prenantes / secteurs concernés

score_descriptions_en.1: No mechanism in place
score_descriptions_en.2: Focal points are identified in relevant stakeholders (food safety sector, human health sector, surveillance and response staffs, animal health sector, key laboratories)
score_descriptions_en.3: Operational links are established between surveillance and response staffs, food safety, animal health and laboratories
score_descriptions_en.4: Staff responsible for surveillance and response, food safety, laboratories and agriculture work together to consider the risks and interventions
score_descriptions_en.5: There is an effective (formal or informal) mechanism for rapid information exchange during suspected foodborne disease outbreak investigations between all the stakeholders / relevant sectors

capacities.target_description_fr: Les États parties devraient disposer d'une capacité de surveillance et d'intervention pour les risques ou événements de maladies d'origine alimentaire et hydrique. Cela nécessite une communication et une collaboration efficaces entre les secteurs responsables de la sécurité alimentaire, de l'eau potable et de l'assainissement.
capacities.target_description_en: States Parties should have surveillance and response capacity for food and water borne disease risk or events. It requires effective communication and collaboration among the sectors responsible for food safety and safe water and sanitation.
capacities.desired_impact_fr: Détection rapide et intervention efficace des événements potentiels liés à l'alimentation en collaboration avec d'autres secteurs responsables de la sécurité alimentaire.
capacities.desired_impact_en: Timely detection and effective response of potential food-related events in collaboration with other sectors responsible for food safety.
capacities.notes_fr: Les indicateurs se réfèrent à la détection et à l'intervention aux événements liés à l'alimentation et à l'environnement propice pour mettre en place un mécanisme de contrôle de la sécurité alimentaire avec la législation, les lois ou les règlements appropriés et avec la participation de multiples secteurs. La capacité de détection comprend la surveillance mais également les capacités de laboratoire requises pour la vérification de tout événement.
capacities.notes_en: Indicators refer to detection and responding to the food-related events and enabling environment for putting food safety control mechanism in place with appropriate legislation, laws, or policy and with the involvement of multiple sectors. Detection capacity includes surveillance but also the laboratory capacity required for the verification of any events.

capacities.name: Biosafety and Biosecurity
capacities.target_description: A whole-of-government national biosafety and biosecurity system is in place, ensuring that especially dangerous pathogens are identifed, held, secured and monitored in a minimal number of facilities according to best practices; biological risk management training and educational outreach are conducted to promote a shared culture of responsibility, reduce dual use risks, mitigate biological proliferation and deliberate use threats, and ensure safe transfer of biological agents; and countryspecifc biosafety and biosecurity legislation, laboratory licensing, and pathogen control measures are in place as appropriate.
capacities.as_measured_by: Number of countries who have completed/Completion of a national framework and comprehensive oversight system for pathogen biosafety and biosecurity, strain collections, containment laboratories and monitoring systems that includes identifcation and storage of national strain collections in a minimal number of facilities.
capacities.desired_impact: Implementation of a comprehensive, sustainable and legally embedded national oversight program for biosafety and biosecurity, including the safe and secure use, storage, disposal, and containment of pathogens found in laboratories and a minimal number of holdings across the country, including research, diagnostic and biotechnology facilities. A cadre of biological risk management experts possesses the skillset to train others within their respective institutions. Strengthened, sustainable biological risk management best practices are in place using common educational materials. Rapid and culture-free diagnostics are promoted as a facet of biological risk management. The transport of infectious substances will also be taken into account.

indicators.name: Whole-of-government biosafety and biosecurity system is in place for human, animal, and agriculture facilities

score_descriptions.1: No elements of a comprehensive national biosafety and biosecurity system are in place
score_descriptions.2:
Some, but not all, elements of a comprehensive biosafety and biosecurity system are in place; country is: Starting the process to monitor and develop an updated record and inventory of pathogens within facilities that store or process dangerous pathogens and toxins and what they house. Developing, but has not finalized, comprehensive national biosafety and biosecurity legislation. Developing laboratory licensing. Developing pathogen control measures, including standards for physical containment and operational handling and failure reporting systems. Not consolidating dangerous pathogens and toxins into a minimum number of facilities. Not employing diagnostics that preclude culturing dangerous pathogens. Not implementing oversight monitoring and enforcement mechanisms
Not implementing oversight monitoring and enforcement mechanisms.
score_descriptions.3: Comprehensive national biosafety and biosecurity system is being developed; country is: Finalizing the process to support the active monitoring and maintaining of up-to-date records and pathogen inventories within facilities that store or process dangerous pathogens and toxins. Finalizing the development and implementation of comprehensive national biosafety and biosecurity legislation. Finalizing the development and implementation of laboratory licensing. Finalizing the development and implementation of pathogen control measures, including standards for physical containment and operational handling , and containment failure reporting systems. Starting the consolidation of dangerous pathogens and toxins into a minimum number of facilities. Starting to put into place tools and resources to support diagnostics that preclude culturing dangerous pathogens. Starting to put into place oversight monitoring and enforcement mechanisms.
score_descriptions.4: Biosafety and biosecurity system is developed, but not sustainable; country is: Actively monitoring and maintaining an updated record and inventory of pathogens within facilities that store or process dangerous pathogens and toxins. Implementing enacted comprehensive national biosafety and biosecurity legislation. Implementing laboratory licensing. Implementing pathogen control measures, including standards for physical containment and operational handling and containment failure reporting systems.. Completed consolidating dangerous pathogens and toxins into a minimum number of facilities.. Employing diagnostics that preclude culturing dangerous pathogens. Implementing oversight monitoring and enforcement activities.
score_descriptions.5: Sustainable biosafety and biosecurity system is in place; country is: Compliant with numbers one through six under “Demonstrated Capacity” plus: Ministries have made available adequate funding and political support for the comprehensive national biosafety and biosecurity system, including maintenance of facilities and equipment.

actions.name: Review and revise biosafety and biosecurity legislation

inputs.name: Hire national consultant to provide expert advice

line_items.name: Daily fees (total)
line_items.description: Fees for 40-days of consultant time to provide expert advice regarding national biosafety and biosecurity legislation
line_items.function_tag: Planning including assessment, design, planning, policy, legislation
line_items.references: Equivalent of 40 days' work by external consultant (national) for research, meetings, outreach, and travel. Default fees per day is UN Level D maximum daily rate established October 2013 (Source: ST/AI/2013/4). Default per diem is official WHO/UN per diem for Nairobi, Kenya.
line_items.where_find_base_cost: Daily rate: use UN Level D or local market daily rates for expert consultant, and adjust the number of days as needed. Per diem: use official WHO/UN per diem or local government per diem.
line_items.description_fr: Honoraires de 40 jours de consultant pour fournir des conseils d'expert concernant la législation nationale sur la biosécurité et la biosûreté
line_items.description_en: Fees for 40-days of consultant time to provide expert advice regarding national biosafety and biosecurity legislation
line_items.function_tag_fr: Planification incluant l'évaluation, la conception, la planification, la réglementation, la législation
line_items.function_tag_en: Planning including assessment, design, planning, policy, legislation
line_items.references_fr: Équivalent de 40 jours de travail par un consultant externe (national) pour la recherche, les réunions, la sensibilisation et les voyages. Les frais par jour par défaut correspondent au taux journalier maximal de niveau D des Nations Unies établi en octobre 2013 (Source: ST / AI / 2013/4). Le per diem par défaut est le per diem OMS / ONU pour Nairobi, Kenya.
line_items.references_en: Equivalent of 40 days' work by external consultant (national) for research, meetings, outreach, and travel. Default fees per day is UN Level D maximum daily rate established October 2013 (Source: ST/AI/2013/4). Default per diem is official WHO/UN per diem for Nairobi, Kenya.
line_items.where_find_base_cost_fr: Tarif par jour: utiliser les tarifs par jour de niveau D de l'ONU ou les tarifs par jour du marché local pour les consultants experts, et ajuster le nombre de jours si nécessaire. Per diem: utiliser les per diem officiels de l'OMS / ONU ou du gouvernement local.
line_items.where_find_base_cost_en: Daily rate: use UN Level D or local market daily rates for expert consultant, and adjust the number of days as needed. Per diem: use official WHO/UN per diem or local government per diem.

inputs.name_fr: Engager un consultant national pour fournir des conseils d'experts

inputs.name: Hold stakeholder workshops to review legal framework

line_items.name: Workshop expenditures
line_items.description: Expenses for 4 small, 1-day workshops for national stakeholders to review and revise national legal framework for biosafety and biosecurity. Includes facility rental, stationary, refreshments, and other incidentals.
line_items.function_tag: Planning including assessment, design, planning, policy, legislation
line_items.references: Equivalent of 4 full-day, small meetings including paid conference venue, refreshments and stationery.
line_items.where_find_base_cost: Conference costs: determine per person costs for a small, full-day meeting based on local conference rates (refreshments, stationery, incidentals, and venue) at the national level. Adjust the number of participants and days as needed.
line_items.description_fr: Dépenses pour 4 petits ateliers d'une journée destinés aux parties prenantes nationales pour examiner et réviser le cadre juridique national pour la biosécurité et la biosûreté. Comprend la location d'installations, la papeterie, les rafraîchissements et autres frais accessoires.
line_items.description_en: Expenses for 4 small, 1-day workshops for national stakeholders to review and revise national legal framework for biosafety and biosecurity. Includes facility rental, stationary, refreshments, and other incidentals.
line_items.function_tag_fr: Planification incluant l'évaluation, la conception, la planification, la réglementation, la législation
line_items.function_tag_en: Planning including assessment, design, planning, policy, legislation
line_items.references_fr: Équivalent de 4 petites réunions d'une journée complète comprenant un lieu de conférence payant, des rafraîchissements et de la papeterie.
line_items.references_en: Equivalent of 4 full-day, small meetings including paid conference venue, refreshments and stationery.
line_items.where_find_base_cost_fr: Coûts de conférence: déterminer les coûts par personne pour une petite réunion d'une journée basée sur les tarifs des conférences locales (rafraîchissements, papeterie, frais accessoires et salle) au niveau national. Ajuster le nombre de participants et les jours selon les besoins.
line_items.where_find_base_cost_en: Conference costs: determine per person costs for a small, full-day meeting based on local conference rates (refreshments, stationery, incidentals, and venue) at the national level. Adjust the number of participants and days as needed.

line_items.name: Workshop per diems
line_items.description: Per diems for 4 small, 1-day workshops for national stakeholders to review and revise national legal framework for biosafety and biosecurity
line_items.function_tag: Planning including assessment, design, planning, policy, legislation
line_items.references: Assumes national daily travel allowance (at national rate) for each day times the equivalent of 4 small meetings (1 day each). Default per diem (105.00 USD) is based on WHO-CHOICE National-Level Per Diem in USD 2017.
line_items.where_find_base_cost: Per diem: use daily rates set by national regulations, WHO/UN rates (http://apps.who.int/bfi/tsy/PerDiem.aspx), or WHO-CHOICE rates and adjust  number of participants and days as needed.
line_items.description_fr: Per diem pour 4 petits ateliers d'une journée à l'intention des parties prenantes nationales pour examiner et réviser le cadre juridique national pour la biosécurité et la biosûreté
line_items.description_en: Per diems for 4 small, 1-day workshops for national stakeholders to review and revise national legal framework for biosafety and biosecurity
line_items.function_tag_fr: Planification incluant l'évaluation, la conception, la planification, la réglementation, la législation
line_items.function_tag_en: Planning including assessment, design, planning, policy, legislation
line_items.references_fr: Suppose un per diem de déplacement (au taux national) pour chaque jour multiplié par l'équivalent de 4 petites réunions (1 jour chacune). Les per diem par défaut (105 USD) sont basées sur les per diem de niveau national de l'WHO-CHOICE en USD 2017.
line_items.references_en: Assumes national daily travel allowance (at national rate) for each day times the equivalent of 4 small meetings (1 day each). Default per diem (105.00 USD) is based on WHO-CHOICE National-Level Per Diem in USD 2017.
line_items.where_find_base_cost_fr: Per diem: utiliser les taux par jour fixés par les réglementations nationales, les taux OMS / ONU (<http://apps.who.int/bfi/tsy/PerDiem.aspx>), ou les taux WHO-CHOICE et ajuster le nombre de participants et les jours nécessaire.
line_items.where_find_base_cost_en: Per diem: use daily rates set by national regulations, WHO/UN rates (http://apps.who.int/bfi/tsy/PerDiem.aspx), or WHO-CHOICE rates and adjust  number of participants and days as needed.

line_items.name: Printed draft legislation
line_items.description: Printed materials for workshop to review and revise national legal framework for biosafety and biosecurity (100 copies of a small print job)
line_items.function_tag: Planning including assessment, design, planning, policy, legislation
line_items.references: Assumes printing of 100 copies for meetings and for outreach to other national stakeholders at 50 pages / copy (estimate based on published health security acts).
line_items.where_find_base_cost: Printing: to estimate per-copy printing costs, multiply the local per-page printing rates by the total estimated number of pages, and adjust number of copies as needed.
line_items.name_fr: Travaux d'impression des projets de loi
line_items.description_fr: Documents imprimés pour l'atelier afin d'examiner et de réviser le cadre juridique national pour la biosécurité et la biosécurité (100 exemplaires d'un petit travail d'impression)
line_items.description_en: Printed materials for workshop to review and revise national legal framework for biosafety and biosecurity (100 copies of a small print job)
line_items.function_tag_fr: Planification incluant l'évaluation, la conception, la planification, la réglementation, la législation
line_items.function_tag_en: Planning including assessment, design, planning, policy, legislation
line_items.references_fr: Présumer l'impression de 100 exemplaires pour les réunions et pour la sensibilisation à d'autres parties prenantes nationales à 50 pages / copie (estimation basée sur les lois publiées de sécurité sanitaire).
line_items.references_en: Assumes printing of 100 copies for meetings and for outreach to other national stakeholders at 50 pages / copy (estimate based on published health security acts).
line_items.where_find_base_cost_fr: Travaux d'impression: pour estimer les coûts d'impression par copie, multiplier les taux d'impression locaux par page par le nombre total estimé de pages, et ajuster le nombre de copies selon les besoins.
line_items.where_find_base_cost_en: Printing: to estimate per-copy printing costs, multiply the local per-page printing rates by the total estimated number of pages, and adjust number of copies as needed.

indicators.name_fr: Un système de biosécurité et de biosûreté pangouvernemental est en place pour les installations humaines, animales et agricoles
indicators.name_en: Whole-of-government biosafety and biosecurity system is in place for human, animal, and agriculture facilities

score_descriptions_fr.1: Aucun élément d'un système national exhaustif de biosécurité et de biosûreté n'est en place
score_descriptions_fr.2: Certains des éléments, mais pas tous, d'un système exhaustif de biosécurité et de biosûreté sont en place: le pays commence à suivre et à mettre à jour un registre et un inventaire des agents pathogènes dans les installations qui stockent ou traitent les pathogènes et les toxines dangereux. Développe, mais sans l'avoir finalisée, une législation nationale complète sur la biosécurité et la biosûreté. Développe des licences de laboratoire. Développe des mesures de contrôle des pathogènes, y compris des normes de confinement physique et de manipulation opérationnelle et des systèmes de signalement des défaillances. Ne consolide pas les agents pathogènes dangereux et les toxines dans un nombre minimum d'installations. N'utilise pas de diagnostics qui empêchent la culture de pathogènes dangereux. Ne met pas en place des mécanismes de surveillance et d'application de la surveillance.
score_descriptions_fr.3: Un système national complet de biosécurité et de biosûreté est en cours d'élaboration; le pays est en cours de: Finaliser le processus pour soutenir le suivi actif et le maintien des registres à jour et des inventaires de pathogènes dans les installations qui stockent ou traitent des agents pathogènes dangereux et des toxines. Finaliser l'élaboration et la mise en œuvre d'une législation nationale exhaustive en matière de biosécurité et de biosûreté. Finaliser le développement et la mise en œuvre des licences de laboratoire. Finaliser l'élaboration et la mise en œuvre de mesures de contrôle des agents pathogènes, y compris des normes pour le confinement physique et la manutention opérationnelle, et des systèmes de signalement des défaillances du confinement. Commencer la consolidation des agents pathogènes dangereux et des toxines en un nombre minimum d'installations. Commencer à mettre en place des outils et des ressources pour soutenir les diagnostics qui empêchent la culture de pathogènes dangereux. Commencer à mettre en place des mécanismes de surveillance et d'application de la surveillance.
score_descriptions_fr.4: Le système de biosécurité et de biosûreté est développé, mais pas de façon durable; le pays accomplit : la surveillance active et la tenue à jour d'un registre et d'un inventaire mis à jour des agents pathogènes dans les installations qui stockent ou traitent des agents pathogènes dangereux et des toxines. Met en œuvre une législation nationale complète en matière de biosécurité et de biosûreté. Met en place de licences de laboratoire. Met en œuvre de mesures de contrôle des agents pathogènes, y compris des normes de confinement physique et de manipulation opérationnelle et des systèmes de signalement des défaillances du confinement. Consolide des agents pathogènes dangereux et des toxines dans un nombre minimum d'installations. Utilise des diagnostics empêchant la culture de pathogènes dangereux. Met en œuvre des activités de surveillance et d'application de la surveillance.
score_descriptions_fr.5: Un système durable de biosécurité et de biosûreté est en place ; le pays est : en conformité avec les points un à six sous «Capacité démontrée» et : Les ministères ont mis à disposition un financement adéquat et un soutien politique pour le système national exhaustif de biosécurité et de biosûreté, y compris l'entretien des installations et de l'équipement.

score_descriptions_en.1: No elements of a comprehensive national biosafety and biosecurity system are in place
score_descriptions_en.2:
Some, but not all, elements of a comprehensive biosafety and biosecurity system are in place; country is: Starting the process to monitor and develop an updated record and inventory of pathogens within facilities that store or process dangerous pathogens and toxins and what they house. Developing, but has not finalized, comprehensive national biosafety and biosecurity legislation. Developing laboratory licensing. Developing pathogen control measures, including standards for physical containment and operational handling and failure reporting systems. Not consolidating dangerous pathogens and toxins into a minimum number of facilities. Not employing diagnostics that preclude culturing dangerous pathogens. Not implementing oversight monitoring and enforcement mechanisms
Not implementing oversight monitoring and enforcement mechanisms.
score_descriptions_en.3: Comprehensive national biosafety and biosecurity system is being developed; country is: Finalizing the process to support the active monitoring and maintaining of up-to-date records and pathogen inventories within facilities that store or process dangerous pathogens and toxins. Finalizing the development and implementation of comprehensive national biosafety and biosecurity legislation. Finalizing the development and implementation of laboratory licensing. Finalizing the development and implementation of pathogen control measures, including standards for physical containment and operational handling , and containment failure reporting systems. Starting the consolidation of dangerous pathogens and toxins into a minimum number of facilities. Starting to put into place tools and resources to support diagnostics that preclude culturing dangerous pathogens. Starting to put into place oversight monitoring and enforcement mechanisms.
score_descriptions_en.4: Biosafety and biosecurity system is developed, but not sustainable; country is: Actively monitoring and maintaining an updated record and inventory of pathogens within facilities that store or process dangerous pathogens and toxins. Implementing enacted comprehensive national biosafety and biosecurity legislation. Implementing laboratory licensing. Implementing pathogen control measures, including standards for physical containment and operational handling and containment failure reporting systems.. Completed consolidating dangerous pathogens and toxins into a minimum number of facilities.. Employing diagnostics that preclude culturing dangerous pathogens. Implementing oversight monitoring and enforcement activities.
score_descriptions_en.5: Sustainable biosafety and biosecurity system is in place; country is: Compliant with numbers one through six under “Demonstrated Capacity” plus: Ministries have made available adequate funding and political support for the comprehensive national biosafety and biosecurity system, including maintenance of facilities and equipment.

indicators.name: Biosafety and biosecurity training practices

score_descriptions.1: No biological biosafety and biosecurity training or plans are in place
score_descriptions.2: Country has conducted a training needs assessment and identifed gaps in biosafety and biosecurity training but has not yet implemented comprehensive training or a common training curriculum. General lack of awareness among the laboratory workforce of international biosafety and biosecurity best practices for safe, secure and responsible conduct. Country does not yet have sustained academic training in institutions that train those who maintain or work with dangerous pathogens and toxins.
score_descriptions.3: Country has a training program in place with common curriculum; has begun implementation. Country has a training program in place at most facilities housing or working with dangerous pathogens and toxins. Training on biosafety and biosecurity has been provided to staﬀ at some, but not all, facilities that maintain or work with dangerous pathogens and toxins Country is developing, or has not yet implemented, a train-the-trainers program for biosafety. Country is developing sustained academic training for those who maintain or work with dangerous pathogens and toxins.
score_descriptions.4: Country has a training program in place with common curriculum and a train-thetrainers program. Country has a training program in place at all facilities housing or working with dangerous pathogens and toxins. Training on biosafety and biosecurity has been provided to staﬀ at all facilities that maintain or work with dangerous pathogens and toxins. Country is implementing a train-the-trainers program. Country has in place sustained academic training in institutions that train those who maintain or work with dangerous pathogens and toxins. Country has limited ability to self-sustain all of the above.
score_descriptions.5: Country has a sustainable training program, train-the-trainers program, and common curriculum. Staﬀ are tested at least annually and exercises are conducted on biological risk protocols. Country is compliant with numbers one through five under Demonstrated Capacity and has funding and capacity to sustain all of the above. Review of training needs assessment is conducted annually and refresher training on need areas conducted annually. Training on emergency response procedures provided annually.

indicators.name_fr: Pratiques de formation en biosécurité et biosûreté
indicators.name_en: Biosafety and biosecurity training practices

score_descriptions_fr.1: Aucune formation ou projet de formation en biosécurité et en biosûreté ne sont en place
score_descriptions_fr.2: Le pays a mené une évaluation des besoins de formation et identifié des lacunes dans la formation à la biosécurité et à la biosûreté, mais n'a pas encore mis en œuvre une formation complète ou un programme de formation commun. Il y a un manque général de sensibilisation des personnels de laboratoire aux meilleures pratiques internationales en matière de biosécurité et de biosûreté pour une conduite sûre, sécurisée et responsable. Le pays n'a pas encore de formation académique soutenue dans des institutions qui forment ceux qui entretiennent ou travaillent avec des agents pathogènes dangereux et des toxines.
score_descriptions_fr.3: Le pays a un programme de formation en place avec un tronc commun; et a commencé la mise en œuvre. Le pays a mis en place un programme de formation dans la plupart des établissements hébergeant ou travaillant avec des agents pathogènes dangereux et des toxines. Des formations sur la biosécurité et la biosûreté ont été dispensées à certaines installations, mais pas à toutes, qui entretiennent ou utilisent des agents pathogènes dangereux et des toxines. Le pays développe ou n'a pas encore mis en œuvre un programme de formation des formateurs en matière de biosécurité. Le pays développe une formation académique soutenue pour ceux qui maintiennent ou travaillent avec des agents pathogènes dangereux et des toxines.
score_descriptions_fr.4: Le pays a mis en place un programme de formation avec un tronc commun et un programme de formation des formateurs. Le pays a mis en place un programme de formation dans toutes les installations abritant ou travaillant avec des agents pathogènes dangereux et des toxines. Des formations sur la biosécurité et la biosûreté ont été dispensées à toutes les installations qui entretiennent ou travaillent avec des agents pathogènes dangereux et des toxines. Le pays met en œuvre un programme de formation des formateurs. Le pays a mis en place une formation académique soutenue dans des institutions qui forment ceux qui entretiennent ou travaillent avec des agents pathogènes dangereux et des toxines. Le pays a une capacité limitée avec une durabilité autonome à tout ce qui précède.
score_descriptions_fr.5: Le pays dispose d'un programme de formation durable, d'un programme de formation des formateurs et d'un tronc commun. Le personnel est testé au moins une fois par an et des exercices sont menés sur les protocoles de risques biologiques. Le pays se conforme aux numéros 1 à 5 en vertu des capacités démontrées et dispose du financement et de la capacité pour soutenir tout ce qui précède. L'examen de l'évaluation des besoins de formation est effectué chaque année et une formation de recyclage sur les l'analyse des besoins est effectuée chaque année. Une formation sur les procédures d'intervention d'urgence est fournie annuellement.

score_descriptions_en.1: No biological biosafety and biosecurity training or plans are in place
score_descriptions_en.2: Country has conducted a training needs assessment and identifed gaps in biosafety and biosecurity training but has not yet implemented comprehensive training or a common training curriculum. General lack of awareness among the laboratory workforce of international biosafety and biosecurity best practices for safe, secure and responsible conduct. Country does not yet have sustained academic training in institutions that train those who maintain or work with dangerous pathogens and toxins.
score_descriptions_en.3: Country has a training program in place with common curriculum; has begun implementation. Country has a training program in place at most facilities housing or working with dangerous pathogens and toxins. Training on biosafety and biosecurity has been provided to staﬀ at some, but not all, facilities that maintain or work with dangerous pathogens and toxins Country is developing, or has not yet implemented, a train-the-trainers program for biosafety. Country is developing sustained academic training for those who maintain or work with dangerous pathogens and toxins.
score_descriptions_en.4: Country has a training program in place with common curriculum and a train-thetrainers program. Country has a training program in place at all facilities housing or working with dangerous pathogens and toxins. Training on biosafety and biosecurity has been provided to staﬀ at all facilities that maintain or work with dangerous pathogens and toxins. Country is implementing a train-the-trainers program. Country has in place sustained academic training in institutions that train those who maintain or work with dangerous pathogens and toxins. Country has limited ability to self-sustain all of the above.
score_descriptions_en.5: Country has a sustainable training program, train-the-trainers program, and common curriculum. Staﬀ are tested at least annually and exercises are conducted on biological risk protocols. Country is compliant with numbers one through five under Demonstrated Capacity and has funding and capacity to sustain all of the above. Review of training needs assessment is conducted annually and refresher training on need areas conducted annually. Training on emergency response procedures provided annually.

capacities.target_description_fr: Un système national de biosécurité et de biosûreté à l'échelle du gouvernement est en place, garantissant que les agents pathogènes particulièrement dangereux sont identifiés, détenus, sécurisés et contrôlés dans un nombre minimal d'installations conformément aux meilleures pratiques ; la formation à la gestion des risques biologiques et la sensibilisation à l'éducation visent à promouvoir une culture commune de responsabilité, à réduire les risques de double usage, à atténuer la prolifération biologique et les menaces délibérées d'utilisation et à assurer le transfert sans danger des agents biologiques ; et la législation sur la biosécurité et la biosûreté spécifique au pays, les licences de laboratoire et les mesures de contrôle des agents pathogènes sont en place, le cas échéant.
capacities.target_description_en: A whole-of-government national biosafety and biosecurity system is in place, ensuring that especially dangerous pathogens are identifed, held, secured and monitored in a minimal number of facilities according to best practices; biological risk management training and educational outreach are conducted to promote a shared culture of responsibility, reduce dual use risks, mitigate biological proliferation and deliberate use threats, and ensure safe transfer of biological agents; and countryspecifc biosafety and biosecurity legislation, laboratory licensing, and pathogen control measures are in place as appropriate.
capacities.as_measured_by_en: Number of countries who have completed/Completion of a national framework and comprehensive oversight system for pathogen biosafety and biosecurity, strain collections, containment laboratories and monitoring systems that includes identifcation and storage of national strain collections in a minimal number of facilities.
capacities.desired_impact_fr: Mise en œuvre d'un programme de surveillance national exhaustif, durable et légalement intégré pour la biosécurité et la biosûreté, y compris l'utilisation, le stockage, l'élimination et le confinement des agents pathogènes dans les laboratoires et un nombre minimal d'exploitations dans le pays, y compris les installations de biotechnologie. Un groupe d'experts en gestion des risques biologiques possède les compétences nécessaires pour former d'autres personnes au sein de leurs institutions respectives. Des pratiques exemplaires de gestion des risques biologiques renforcées et durables sont en place à l'aide de matériel pédagogique commun. Des diagnostics rapides et sans culture sont promus en tant que composante de la gestion des risques biologiques. Le transport de matières infectieuses sera également pris en compte.
capacities.desired_impact_en: Implementation of a comprehensive, sustainable and legally embedded national oversight program for biosafety and biosecurity, including the safe and secure use, storage, disposal, and containment of pathogens found in laboratories and a minimal number of holdings across the country, including research, diagnostic and biotechnology facilities. A cadre of biological risk management experts possesses the skillset to train others within their respective institutions. Strengthened, sustainable biological risk management best practices are in place using common educational materials. Rapid and culture-free diagnostics are promoted as a facet of biological risk management. The transport of infectious substances will also be taken into account.

capacities.name: Immunization
capacities.target_description: A functioning national vaccine delivery system with nationwide reach, effective distributions, access for marginalized populations, adequate cold chain, and ongoing quality control—that is able to respond to new disease threats.
capacities.as_measured_by: 90% -95% coverage of the country’s twelve-month-old population with at least one dose of measles-containing vaccine as demonstrated by coverage surveys or administrative data.
capacities.desired_impact: Effective protection through achievement and maintenance of immunization against measles and other epidemic-prone vaccine-preventable diseases (VPDs). Measles immunization is emphasized because it is widely recognized as a proxy indicator for overall immunization against VPDs. Countries will also identify and target immunization to populations at risk of other epidemic-prone VPDs of national importance (e.g., cholera, Japanese encephalitis, meningococcal disease, typhoid, and yellow fever). In the case of some diseases that are transferable from cattle to humans, such as anthrax and rabies, animal immunization should also be taken into account.

indicators.name: Vaccine coverage (measles) as part of national program

score_descriptions.1: Less than 50% of the country’s 12-month-old population has received at least one dose of measles containing vaccine, as demonstrated by coverage surveys or administrative data; plan is in place to improve coverage, including supplemental immunization activities
score_descriptions.2: 50-69% of the country’s 12-month-old population has received at least one dose of measles containing vaccine, as demonstrated by coverage surveys or administrative data; plan is in place to reach 90% within the next five years to include supplemental immunization activities
score_descriptions.3: 70-89% of the country’s 12-month-old population has received at least one dose of measles containing vaccine, as demonstrated by coverage surveys or administrative data; plan is in place to reach 90% within the next three years
score_descriptions.4: 90% of the country’s 12-month-old population has received at least one dose of measles containing vaccine, as demonstrated by coverage surveys or administrative data. 80% of all sub-national (districts/provinces) units covered
score_descriptions.5: 95% of the country’s 12-month-old population has received at least one dose of measles containing vaccine, as demonstrated by coverage surveys or administrative data; or 90% of the country’s 12-month-old population has received at least one dose of measles containing vaccine and the trajectory of progress, plans and capacities are in place to achieve 95% coverage by 2020. More than 80% of all sub-national (districts/provinces) units are covered

indicators.name_fr: Couverture vaccinale (rougeole) dans le cadre du programme national
indicators.name_en: Vaccine coverage (measles) as part of national program

score_descriptions_fr.1: Moins de 50% de la population du pays âgée de 12 mois a reçu au moins une dose de vaccin antirougeole, comme en témoignent les enquêtes de couverture ou les données administratives ; un plan est en place pour améliorer la couverture, y compris les activités de vaccination supplémentaires
score_descriptions_fr.2: 50 à 69% de la population du pays âgée de 12 mois a reçu au moins une dose de vaccin antirougeole, comme en témoignent les enquêtes de couverture ou les données administratives ; un plan est en place pour atteindre 90% dans les cinq prochaines années pour inclure des activités de vaccination supplémentaires
score_descriptions_fr.3: 70 à 89% de la population du pays âgée de 12 mois a reçu au moins une dose de vaccin antirougeole, comme en témoignent les enquêtes de couverture ou les données administratives ; un plan est en place pour atteindre 90% au cours des trois prochaines années
score_descriptions_fr.4: 90% de la population du pays âgée de 12 mois a reçu au moins une dose de vaccin antirougeole, comme en témoignent les enquêtes de couverture ou les données administratives. 80% de toutes les unités infranationales (districts / provinces) sont couvertes.
score_descriptions_fr.5: 95% de la population du pays âgée de 12 mois a reçu au moins une dose de vaccin antirougeole, comme en témoignent les enquêtes de couverture ou les données administratives ; ou 90% de la population du pays âgée de 12 mois a reçu au moins une dose de vaccin antirougeole, et la ligne de progrès, les plans et les capacités sont en place pour atteindre une couverture de 95% d'ici 2020. Plus de 80% des unités nationales (districts / provinces) sont couvertes

score_descriptions_en.1: Less than 50% of the country’s 12-month-old population has received at least one dose of measles containing vaccine, as demonstrated by coverage surveys or administrative data; plan is in place to improve coverage, including supplemental immunization activities
score_descriptions_en.2: 50-69% of the country’s 12-month-old population has received at least one dose of measles containing vaccine, as demonstrated by coverage surveys or administrative data; plan is in place to reach 90% within the next five years to include supplemental immunization activities
score_descriptions_en.3: 70-89% of the country’s 12-month-old population has received at least one dose of measles containing vaccine, as demonstrated by coverage surveys or administrative data; plan is in place to reach 90% within the next three years
score_descriptions_en.4: 90% of the country’s 12-month-old population has received at least one dose of measles containing vaccine, as demonstrated by coverage surveys or administrative data. 80% of all sub-national (districts/provinces) units covered
score_descriptions_en.5: 95% of the country’s 12-month-old population has received at least one dose of measles containing vaccine, as demonstrated by coverage surveys or administrative data; or 90% of the country’s 12-month-old population has received at least one dose of measles containing vaccine and the trajectory of progress, plans and capacities are in place to achieve 95% coverage by 2020. More than 80% of all sub-national (districts/provinces) units are covered

indicators.name: National vaccine access and delivery

score_descriptions.1: No plan is in place for nationwide vaccine delivery OR plans have been drafted to provide vaccines throughout the country to target populations but not implemented; inadequate vaccine procurement and forecasting lead to regular stock outs at the central and district level
score_descriptions.2: Implementation has begun to maintain cold chain for vaccine delivery, but is available in fewer than 40% of districts in country OR vaccine delivery (maintaining cold chain) is available to less than 40% of the target population in the country; inadequate vaccine procurement and forecasting lead to occasional stock outs at the central and district level
score_descriptions.3: Vaccine delivery (maintaining cold chain) is available in 40-59% of districts within the country OR Vaccine delivery (maintaining cold chain) is available to 40-59% of the target population in the country; vaccine procurement and forecasting leads to no stock outs of vaccines at central level and occasional stock outs at district level
score_descriptions.4: Vaccine delivery (maintaining cold chain) is available in 60-79% of districts within the country OR Vaccine delivery (maintaining cold chain) is available in 60-79% of the target population in the country; functional vaccine procurement and forecasting lead to no stock outs at the central level and rare stock outs at the district level
score_descriptions.5: Vaccine delivery (maintaining cold chain) is available in greater than 80% of districts within the country OR Vaccine delivery (maintaining cold chain) is available to more than 80% of the national target population; systems to reach marginalized populations using culturally appropriate practices are in place; vaccine delivery has been tested through a nationwide vaccine campaign or functional exercise; functional procurement and vaccine forecasting results in no stock-outs

score_descriptions_fr.1: Aucun plan n'est en place pour la livraison de vaccins à l'échelle nationale OU des plans ont été rédigés pour fournir des vaccins dans tout le pays pour cibler les populations mais ne sont pas mis en œuvre; des achats et des prévisions de vaccins inadéquats entraînent des ruptures de stock régulières au niveau central et au niveau des districts
score_descriptions_fr.2: La mise en œuvre a commencé pour maintenir la chaîne du froid pour la distribution du vaccin, mais est disponible dans moins de 40% des districts du pays OU la livraison du vaccin (maintien de la chaîne du froid) est disponible pour moins de 40% de la population cible dans le pays ; des achats et des prévisions de vaccins inadéquats entraînent des ruptures de stock occasionnelles au niveau central et au niveau des districts
score_descriptions_fr.3: La livraison du vaccin (maintien de la chaîne du froid) est disponible dans 40-59% des districts du pays OU La livraison du vaccin (maintien de la chaîne du froid) est disponible pour 40-59% de la population cible dans le pays ; l'achat et la prévision de vaccins n'entraînent pas de rupture de stocks de vaccins au niveau central et des ruptures de stock occasionnelles au niveau des districts
score_descriptions_fr.4: La livraison du vaccin (maintien de la chaîne du froid) est disponible dans 60-79% des districts du pays OU La livraison du vaccin (maintien de la chaîne du froid) est disponible dans 60-79% de la population cible dans le pays ; l'achat et la prévision de vaccins fonctionnels n'entraînent aucune rupture de stock au niveau central et des ruptures de stock rares au niveau des districts
score_descriptions_fr.5: La livraison de vaccins (maintien de la chaîne du froid) est disponible dans plus de 80% des districts du pays OU La livraison de vaccins (maintien de la chaîne du froid) est disponible pour plus de 80% de la population cible nationale ; des systèmes pour atteindre les populations marginalisées en utilisant des pratiques culturellement appropriées sont en place ; l'administration du vaccin a été testée grâce à une campagne nationale de vaccination ou à un exercice fonctionnel ; l'approvisionnement fonctionnel et la prévision des vaccins n'entraînent aucune rupture de stock

score_descriptions_en.1: No plan is in place for nationwide vaccine delivery OR plans have been drafted to provide vaccines throughout the country to target populations but not implemented; inadequate vaccine procurement and forecasting lead to regular stock outs at the central and district level
score_descriptions_en.2: Implementation has begun to maintain cold chain for vaccine delivery, but is available in fewer than 40% of districts in country OR vaccine delivery (maintaining cold chain) is available to less than 40% of the target population in the country; inadequate vaccine procurement and forecasting lead to occasional stock outs at the central and district level
score_descriptions_en.3: Vaccine delivery (maintaining cold chain) is available in 40-59% of districts within the country OR Vaccine delivery (maintaining cold chain) is available to 40-59% of the target population in the country; vaccine procurement and forecasting leads to no stock outs of vaccines at central level and occasional stock outs at district level
score_descriptions_en.4: Vaccine delivery (maintaining cold chain) is available in 60-79% of districts within the country OR Vaccine delivery (maintaining cold chain) is available in 60-79% of the target population in the country; functional vaccine procurement and forecasting lead to no stock outs at the central level and rare stock outs at the district level
score_descriptions_en.5: Vaccine delivery (maintaining cold chain) is available in greater than 80% of districts within the country OR Vaccine delivery (maintaining cold chain) is available to more than 80% of the national target population; systems to reach marginalized populations using culturally appropriate practices are in place; vaccine delivery has been tested through a nationwide vaccine campaign or functional exercise; functional procurement and vaccine forecasting results in no stock-outs

capacities.target_description_fr: Un système national de distribution de vaccins est opérationnel avec une portée nationale, des distributions efficaces, un accès pour les populations marginalisées, une chaîne du froid adéquate et un contrôle continu de la qualité - capable de répondre aux nouvelles menaces de maladies.
capacities.target_description_en: A functioning national vaccine delivery system with nationwide reach, effective distributions, access for marginalized populations, adequate cold chain, and ongoing quality control—that is able to respond to new disease threats.
capacities.as_measured_by_en: 90% -95% coverage of the country’s twelve-month-old population with at least one dose of measles-containing vaccine as demonstrated by coverage surveys or administrative data.
capacities.desired_impact_fr: Protection efficace grâce à la réalisation et au maintien de la vaccination contre la rougeole et d'autres maladies à prévention vaccinale (MPV) à risque épidémique. La vaccination contre la rougeole est soulignée car elle est largement reconnue comme un indicateur indirect pour l'immunisation globale contre les MPV. Les pays identifieront et cibleront également la vaccination des populations exposées à d'autres MPV à risque d'épidémie d'importance nationale (par exemple le choléra, l'encéphalite japonaise, la méningococcie, la fièvre typhoïde et la fièvre jaune). Dans le cas de certaines maladies transmissibles du bétail à l'homme, telles que l'anthrax et la rage, la vaccination des animaux devrait également être prise en compte.
capacities.desired_impact_en: Effective protection through achievement and maintenance of immunization against measles and other epidemic-prone vaccine-preventable diseases (VPDs). Measles immunization is emphasized because it is widely recognized as a proxy indicator for overall immunization against VPDs. Countries will also identify and target immunization to populations at risk of other epidemic-prone VPDs of national importance (e.g., cholera, Japanese encephalitis, meningococcal disease, typhoid, and yellow fever). In the case of some diseases that are transferable from cattle to humans, such as anthrax and rabies, animal immunization should also be taken into account.

capacities.name: National Laboratory System
capacities.target_description: Real-time biosurveillance with a national laboratory system and effective modern point-of-care and laboratory-based diagnostics.
capacities.as_measured_by: A nationwide laboratory system able to reliably conduct at least five of the 10 core tests on appropriately identified and collected outbreak specimens transported safely and securely to accredited laboratories from at least 80 percent of intermediate level/districts in the country
capacities.desired_impact: Effective use of a nationwide laboratory system capable of safely and accurately detecting and characterizing pathogens causing epidemic disease, including both known and novel threats, from all parts of the country. Expanded deployment, utilization and sustainment of modern, safe, secure, affordable and appropriate diagnostic tests or devices established.
capacities.notes: The indicators refer to national laboratory capacity for the country.,The national laboratory system should include the ability to conduct at least five of the ten core tests, the ability to transport specimens safely and quickly from 80% or more of intermediate levels/districts to national laboratory facilities for advanced diagnostics, and the ability to conduct higher level diagnostic testing at national laboratories or agreements with regional networks to ensure testing is available.,Core tests can include local priority tests determined by country-selected indicator pathogens on the basis of major national public health concern.

indicators.name: Laboratory testing for detection of priority diseases

score_descriptions.1: National laboratory system is not capable of conducting any core tests.
score_descriptions.2: National laboratory system is capable of conducting 1-2 core tests
score_descriptions.3: National laboratory system is capable of conducting 3-4 core tests
score_descriptions.4: National laboratory system is capable of conducting five or more of the ten core tests
score_descriptions.5: In addition to achieving 'demonstrated capacity', country has national system for procurement and quality assurance

indicators.name_fr: Essais de laboratoire pour la détection de maladies prioritaires
indicators.name_en: Laboratory testing for detection of priority diseases

score_descriptions_fr.1: Le système de laboratoire national n'est pas capable de réaliser des essais de base.
score_descriptions_fr.2: Le système de laboratoire national est capable de réaliser un ou deux tests de base
score_descriptions_fr.3: Le système de laboratoire national est capable de mener 3-4 tests de base
score_descriptions_fr.4: Le système de laboratoire national est capable de réaliser au moins cinq des dix tests de base
score_descriptions_fr.5: En plus d'atteindre la «capacité démontrée», le pays dispose d'un système national d'approvisionnement et de contrôle-qualité

score_descriptions_en.1: National laboratory system is not capable of conducting any core tests.
score_descriptions_en.2: National laboratory system is capable of conducting 1-2 core tests
score_descriptions_en.3: National laboratory system is capable of conducting 3-4 core tests
score_descriptions_en.4: National laboratory system is capable of conducting five or more of the ten core tests
score_descriptions_en.5: In addition to achieving 'demonstrated capacity', country has national system for procurement and quality assurance

indicators.name: Specimen referral and transport system

score_descriptions.1: No system is in place for transporting specimens from intermediate level/districts to national laboratories, only ad hoc transporting.
score_descriptions.2: System is in place to transport specimens to national laboratories from less than 50% of intermediate level/districts in country for advanced diagnostics
score_descriptions.3: System is in place to transport specimens to national laboratories from 50-80% of intermediate level/districts within the country for advanced diagnostics
score_descriptions.4: System is in place to transport specimens to national laboratories from at least 80% of intermediate level/districts within the country for advanced diagnostics
score_descriptions.5: Demonstrated capability plus, transport specimens to/from other labs in the region; specimen transport is funded from host country budget

indicators.name_fr: Système de référence pour le transfert et le transport d’échantillons
indicators.name_en: Specimen referral and transport system

score_descriptions_fr.1: Aucun système n'est en place pour le transport des échantillons des niveaux intermédiaires / districts vers les laboratoires nationaux, à part un transport ad hoc.
score_descriptions_fr.2: Le système est en place pour le transport des échantillons vers les laboratoires nationaux à partir de moins de 50% du niveau intermédiaire / des districts du pays pour des diagnostics avancés
score_descriptions_fr.3: Le système est en place pour transporter les échantillons aux laboratoires nationaux de 50 à 80% des niveaux / districts intermédiaires du pays pour des diagnostics avancés
score_descriptions_fr.4: Le système est en place pour transporter les échantillons vers les laboratoires nationaux à partir d'au moins 80% des niveaux / districts intermédiaires du pays pour des diagnostics avancés
score_descriptions_fr.5: Capacité démontrée plus, transport de échantillons vers / depuis d'autres laboratoires de la région ; le transport d'échantillons est financé par le budget du pays hôte

score_descriptions_en.1: No system is in place for transporting specimens from intermediate level/districts to national laboratories, only ad hoc transporting.
score_descriptions_en.2: System is in place to transport specimens to national laboratories from less than 50% of intermediate level/districts in country for advanced diagnostics
score_descriptions_en.3: System is in place to transport specimens to national laboratories from 50-80% of intermediate level/districts within the country for advanced diagnostics
score_descriptions_en.4: System is in place to transport specimens to national laboratories from at least 80% of intermediate level/districts within the country for advanced diagnostics
score_descriptions_en.5: Demonstrated capability plus, transport specimens to/from other labs in the region; specimen transport is funded from host country budget

indicators.name: Effective modern point of care and laboratory based diagnostics

score_descriptions.1: No evidence of use of rapid and accurate point of care and laboratory based diagnostics. No tier specific diagnostic testing strategies are documented.
score_descriptions.2: Minimal, laboratory diagnostic capability exists within the country, but no tier specific diagnostic testing strategies are documented. point of care diagnostics being used for country priority diseases
score_descriptions.3: Tier specific diagnostic testing strategies are documented, but not fully implemented. Country is proficient in classical diagnostic techniques including bacteriology, serology and PCR in select labs but has limited referral and confirmatory processes. Country is using point of care diagnostics for country priority diseases, and at least one other priority disease.
score_descriptions.4: Country has tier specific diagnostic testing strategies documented and fully implemented, a national system of sample referral and confirmatory diagnostics culminating in performance of modern molecular or serological techniques at national and/or regional laboratories. Country is using point of care diagnostics according to tier specific diagnostic testing strategies for diagnosis of country priority diseases
score_descriptions.5: Country has sustainable capability for performing modern molecular and serological techniques as part of a national system of sample referral and confirmatory diagnostics. Country is using rapid and accurate point of care diagnostics as defined by tier specific diagnostic testing strategies. Country is also engaging formally other reference laboratories for testing capacity not available in country where needed to supplement the national diagnostic testing strategies for seven or more of ten lab tests required for priority diseases Country is able to sustain this capability on its own (no more than 20% dependence on donor funding).
