line_items.name: Trainee stipends
line_items.description: Annual stipends for 10 full-time FETP post-graduate trainees in national or intermediate area field epidemiology training programs
line_items.references: Equivalent of annual stipends for 10 full-time FETP trainees at post-graduate level.
line_items.where_find_base_cost: Salary per year: enter the average cost of the appropriate level public health professional according to your national wage schedule.
line_items.description_fr: Bourses annuelles pour 10 stagiaires postuniversitaires du FETP (programme de formation à l'épidémiologie de terrain) à plein temps dans des programmes de formation en épidémiologie de terrain de niveau national ou intermédiaire
line_items.description_en: Annual stipends for 10 full-time FETP post-graduate trainees in national or intermediate area field epidemiology training programs
line_items.function_tag_fr: Opérations / mise en œuvre
line_items.references_fr: Équivalent des allocations annuelles pour 10 stagiaires en épidémiologie de terrain (FETP) à plein temps au niveau post-universitaire.
line_items.references_en: Equivalent of annual stipends for 10 full-time FETP trainees at post-graduate level.
line_items.where_find_base_cost_fr: Salaire par année: indiquer le coût moyen du professionnel de la santé publique approprié selon l'échelle salariale nationale.
line_items.where_find_base_cost_en: Salary per year: enter the average cost of the appropriate level public health professional according to your national wage schedule.

line_items.name: Trainee field travel allowances
line_items.description: 5-day annual travel per diem allowances to support field investigations by 10 full-time FETP post-graduate trainees in national or intermediate area field epidemiology training program
line_items.references: Assumes national daily travel allowance (at national rate) for each day x 5 days/trainee/year x 10 trainees/year. Default per diem = $105 per person per day, based on WHO-CHOICE National-Level Per Diem in USD2017.
line_items.where_find_base_cost: Per diem: use daily rates set by national regulations OR use WHO/UN rates (http://apps.who.int/bfi/tsy/PerDiem.aspx) or WHO-CHOICE rates and adjust the base multiplier (number of participants eligible for per diem x number of days) as needed.
line_items.description_fr: Per diem de voyage de cinq jours par an pour appuyer les enquêtes sur le terrain par dix stagiaires post-universitaires à plein temps du FETP dans le cadre d'un programme national ou intermédiaire de formation en épidémiologie de terrain
line_items.description_en: 5-day annual travel per diem allowances to support field investigations by 10 full-time FETP post-graduate trainees in national or intermediate area field epidemiology training program
line_items.function_tag_fr: Opérations / mise en œuvre
line_items.references_fr: Présumer une indemnité journalière de déplacement (au taux national) pour chaque jour x 5 jours / stagiaire / année x 10 stagiaires / an. Per diem par défaut = 105 dollars par personne et par jour, sur la base des per diem de niveau national WHO-CHOICE en USD2017.
line_items.references_en: Assumes national daily travel allowance (at national rate) for each day x 5 days/trainee/year x 10 trainees/year. Default per diem = $105 per person per day, based on WHO-CHOICE National-Level Per Diem in USD2017.
line_items.where_find_base_cost_fr: Per diem: utiliser les taux quotidiens fixés par les réglementations nationales OU utiliser les taux OMS / ONU (<http://apps.who.int/bfi/tsy/PerDiem.aspx>) ou les taux WHO-CHOICE et ajuster le multiplicateur de base (nombre de participants admissibles à un nombre quotidien de jours) selon au besoin.
line_items.where_find_base_cost_en: Per diem: use daily rates set by national regulations OR use WHO/UN rates (http://apps.who.int/bfi/tsy/PerDiem.aspx) or WHO-CHOICE rates and adjust the base multiplier (number of participants eligible for per diem x number of days) as needed.

line_items.name: Trainee field supplies and equipment
line_items.description: Annual cost of supplies and equipment needed to support field investigations by 10 full-time FETP post-graduate trainees in national or intermediate area field epidemiology training programs
line_items.references: Based on per trainee costs estimated in budget from US CDC/Kenya work plan for national FETP program start-up.
line_items.where_find_base_cost: Per trainee supply allowances - estimate costs of field investigation kits and multiply times the anticipated number of field investigations conducted annually.
line_items.description_fr: Coût annuel des fournitures et de l'équipement nécessaires pour appuyer les enquêtes sur le terrain par 10 stagiaires postuniversitaires du FETP à temps plein dans des programmes de formation en épidémiologie de terrain dans les zones intermédiaires ou nationales
line_items.description_en: Annual cost of supplies and equipment needed to support field investigations by 10 full-time FETP post-graduate trainees in national or intermediate area field epidemiology training programs
line_items.function_tag_fr: Opérations / mise en œuvre
line_items.references_fr: Sur la base des coûts par stagiaire estimés dans le budget du plan de travail des CDC américains / Kenya pour le démarrage du programme national FETP.
line_items.references_en: Based on per trainee costs estimated in budget from US CDC/Kenya work plan for national FETP program start-up.
line_items.where_find_base_cost_fr: Allocation d'approvisionnement par stagiaire - Estimer le coût des kits d'enquête sur le terrain et multiplier par le nombre prévu d'enquêtes sur le terrain effectuées chaque année.
line_items.where_find_base_cost_en: Per trainee supply allowances - estimate costs of field investigation kits and multiply times the anticipated number of field investigations conducted annually.

line_items.name: Training session expenditures
line_items.description: Expenses for an annual, small, 10-day training session in each intermediate area to train national and sub-national (frontline) surveillance personnelin procedures and tools to analyze data by time, place and person. Includes facility rental, stationary, refreshments, and other incidentals.
line_items.references: Equivalent of 10-day workshop including paid conference venue, refreshments and stationery. Assume SMALL INTERMEDIATE meeting (see worksheet).
line_items.where_find_base_cost: Conference costs: determine per person costs for full-day workshop based on local conference rates (refreshments, stationery, incidentals, and venue) at INTERMEDIATE LEVEL. Multiply by the number of participants to determine the per workshop cost, and adjust the base multiplier (number of workshops) as needed.
line_items.description_fr: Frais d'une petite formation annuelle de 10 jours dans chaque zone intermédiaire pour former le personnel de surveillance national et infra-national (de première ligne) aux procédures et aux outils pour analyser les données par temps, lieu et personne. Comprend la location d'installations, la papeterie, les rafraîchissements et autres frais accessoires.
line_items.description_en: Expenses for an annual, small, 10-day training session in each intermediate area to train national and sub-national (frontline) surveillance personnelin procedures and tools to analyze data by time, place and person. Includes facility rental, stationary, refreshments, and other incidentals.
line_items.function_tag_fr: Opérations / mise en œuvre
line_items.references_fr: Équivalent d'un atelier de 10 jours comprenant un lieu de conférence payant, des rafraîchissements et de la papeterie. Présumer une réunion PETITE DE NIVEAU INTERMEDIAIRE (voir fiche de travail).
line_items.references_en: Equivalent of 10-day workshop including paid conference venue, refreshments and stationery. Assume SMALL INTERMEDIATE meeting (see worksheet).
line_items.where_find_base_cost_fr: Coûts de conférence: déterminer les coûts par personne pour un atelier d'une journée basé sur les tarifs des conférences locales (rafraîchissements, papeterie, accessoires et sale) au niveau INTERMÉDIAIRE. Multiplier par le nombre de participants pour déterminer le coût par atelier, et ajuster le multiplicateur de base (nombre d'ateliers) selon les besoins.
line_items.where_find_base_cost_en: Conference costs: determine per person costs for full-day workshop based on local conference rates (refreshments, stationery, incidentals, and venue) at INTERMEDIATE LEVEL. Multiply by the number of participants to determine the per workshop cost, and adjust the base multiplier (number of workshops) as needed.

line_items.name: Training session per diems
line_items.description: Per diems for an annual, small, 10-day training session in each intermediate area to train national and sub-national (frontline) surveillance personnelin procedures and tools to analyze data by time, place and person
line_items.references: Assumes daily travel allowance (at intermediate 1 rate) for each day x 10 days x 10 participants + 2 trainers each year. Default per diem = $80 per person per day, based on WHO-CHOICE National-Level Per Diem in USD2017.
line_items.where_find_base_cost: Per diem: use daily rates set by national regulations OR use WHO/UN rates (http://apps.who.int/bfi/tsy/PerDiem.aspx) or WHO-CHOICE rates and adjust the base multiplier (number of participants eligible for per diem x number of days) as needed.
line_items.name_fr: Per diem pour session de formation
line_items.description_fr: Per diem pour une petite formation annuelle de 10 jours dans chaque zone intermédiaire pour former le personnel de surveillance national et infra-national (de première ligne) aux procédures et aux outils d'analyse des données par heure, lieu et personne
line_items.description_en: Per diems for an annual, small, 10-day training session in each intermediate area to train national and sub-national (frontline) surveillance personnelin procedures and tools to analyze data by time, place and person
line_items.function_tag_fr: Opérations / mise en œuvre
line_items.references_fr: Présumer une indemnité journalière de déplacement (au taux intermédiaire 1) pour chaque jour x 10 jours x 10 participants + 2 formateurs chaque année. Per diem par défaut = 80 $ par personne et par jour, basé sur le per diem de niveau national de l'WHO-CHOICE en USD2017.
line_items.references_en: Assumes daily travel allowance (at intermediate 1 rate) for each day x 10 days x 10 participants + 2 trainers each year. Default per diem = $80 per person per day, based on WHO-CHOICE National-Level Per Diem in USD2017.
line_items.where_find_base_cost_fr: Per diem: utiliser les taux quotidiens fixés par les réglementations nationales OU utiliser les taux OMS / ONU (<http://apps.who.int/bfi/tsy/PerDiem.aspx>) ou les taux WHO-CHOICE et ajuster le multiplicateur de base (nombre de participants admissibles à un nombre quotidien de jours) selon au besoin.
line_items.where_find_base_cost_en: Per diem: use daily rates set by national regulations OR use WHO/UN rates (http://apps.who.int/bfi/tsy/PerDiem.aspx) or WHO-CHOICE rates and adjust the base multiplier (number of participants eligible for per diem x number of days) as needed.

inputs.name_fr: Stagiaires post-universitaires

actions.name_fr: Développer la capacité nationale de formation en épidémiologie de terrain
actions.name_en: Expand national field epidemiology training capability

indicators.name_fr: Programme de formation en épidémiologie appliquée tel que le Programme de Formation en Epidémiologie de Terrain (FETP en Anglais)
indicators.name_en: Applied epidemiology training program in place such as FETP

score_descriptions_fr.1: Aucun programme de formation en épidémiologie de terrain (FETP) ou en épidémiologie appliquée n'a été établi
score_descriptions_fr.2: Aucun programme FETP ou de formation en épidémiologie appliquée n'est mis en place dans le pays, mais le personnel participe à un programme organisé dans un autre pays à travers un accord existant (au niveau de base, intermédiaire et / ou avancé)
score_descriptions_fr.3: Un niveau de FETP (de base, intermédiaire ou avancé) ou un programme comparable de formation en épidémiologie appliquée est en place dans le pays ou dans un autre pays à travers un accord existant
score_descriptions_fr.4: Deux niveaux de FETP (de base, intermédiaire et / ou avancé) ou des programmes comparables de formation en épidémiologie appliquée sont en place dans le pays ou dans un autre pays à travers un accord existant
score_descriptions_fr.5: Trois niveaux de FETP (de base, intermédiaire et avancé) ou d'autres programmes de formation en épidémiologie appliquée sont en place dans le pays ou dans un autre pays à travers un accord existant, avec un financement national durable

score_descriptions_en.1: No FETP or applied epidemiology training program established
score_descriptions_en.2: No FETP or applied epidemiology training program is established within the country, but staff participate in a program hosted in another country through an existing agreement (at Basic, Intermediate and/or Advanced level)
score_descriptions_en.3: One level of FETP (Basic, Intermediate, or Advanced) FETP or comparable applied epidemiology training program in place in the country or in another country through an existing agreement
score_descriptions_en.4: Two levels of FETP (Basic, Intermediate and/or Advanced) or comparable applied epidemiology training program(s) in place in the country or in another country through an existing agreement
score_descriptions_en.5: Three levels of FETP (Basic, Intermediate and Advanced) or comparable applied epidemiology training program(s) in place in the country or in another country through an existing agreement, with sustainable national funding

indicators.name: Workforce strategy

score_descriptions.1: No health workforce strategy exists
score_descriptions.2: A healthcare workforce strategy exists but does not include public health professions (e.g. epidemiologists, veterinarians and laboratory technicians)
score_descriptions.3: A public health workforce strategy exists, but is not regularly reviewed, updated, or implemented consistently
score_descriptions.4: A public health workforce strategy has been drafted and implemented consistently; strategy is reviewed, tracked and reported on annually
score_descriptions.5: “Demonstrated Capacity” has been achieved, public health workforce retention is tracked and plans are in place to provide continuous education, retain and promote qualified workforce within the national system

actions.name: Establish healthcare workforce strategy for local healthcare providers including doctors and nurses

line_items.name: Salary
line_items.description: Three months of salary for 1 national employee to develop a draft workforce strategy for healthcare providers, including incentive structures, training requirements, and a method for tracking current workforce capabilities

line_items.description_en: Three months of salary for 1 national employee to develop a draft workforce strategy for healthcare providers, including incentive structures, training requirements, and a method for tracking current workforce capabilities

Comprend la location d'installations, la papeterie, les rafraîchissements et autres frais accessoires.

actions.name_fr: Évaluer régulièrement les stratégies de ressources humaines locales
actions.name_en: Regularly evaluate local workforce strategies

indicators.name_fr: Stratégie de ressources humaines
indicators.name_en: Workforce strategy

score_descriptions_fr.1: Aucune stratégie en personnel de santé n'existe
score_descriptions_fr.2: Une stratégie pour les personnels de santé existe mais n'inclut pas les professions de santé publique (par exemple les épidémiologistes, les vétérinaires et les techniciens de laboratoire)
score_descriptions_fr.3: Une stratégie pour le personnel de santé publique existe, mais elle n'est pas régulièrement révisée, mise à jour ou mise en œuvre régulièrement
score_descriptions_fr.4: Une stratégie de personnel de santé publique a été rédigée et mise en œuvre de manière cohérente; la stratégie est examinée, suivie et rapportée chaque année
score_descriptions_fr.5: La «capacité démontrée» a été atteinte, la rétention du personnel de santé publique est suivie et des plans sont en place pour fournir une formation continue, retenir et promouvoir la main-d'œuvre qualifiée dans le système national

score_descriptions_en.1: No health workforce strategy exists
score_descriptions_en.2: A healthcare workforce strategy exists but does not include public health professions (e.g. epidemiologists, veterinarians and laboratory technicians)
score_descriptions_en.3: A public health workforce strategy exists, but is not regularly reviewed, updated, or implemented consistently
score_descriptions_en.4: A public health workforce strategy has been drafted and implemented consistently; strategy is reviewed, tracked and reported on annually
score_descriptions_en.5: “Demonstrated Capacity” has been achieved, public health workforce retention is tracked and plans are in place to provide continuous education, retain and promote qualified workforce within the national system

capacities.target_description_fr: Les États parties devraient disposer de personnel de santé qualifié et compétent pour assurer une surveillance et une intervention de santé publique durables et fonctionnelles à tous les niveaux du système de santé et pour une mise en œuvre efficace du RSI (2005). Cet effectif comprend des médecins, des vétérinaires, des biostatisticiens, des scientifiques de laboratoire, des professionnels de l'agriculture et de l'élevage, avec une cible optimale d'une épidémiologiste de terrain (ou équivalent) pour 200 000 habitants pouvant coopérer systématiquement pour répondre aux compétences essentielles du RSI et des PSV (performances des services vétérinaires).
capacities.target_description_en: State parties should have skilled and competent health personnel for sustainable and functional public health surveillance and response at all levels of the health system and the effective implementation of the IHR (2005). A workforce includes physicians, animal health or veterinarians, biostatisticians, laboratory scientists, farming/livestock professionals, with an optimal target of one trained field epidemiologist (or equivalent) per 200,000 population, who can systematically cooperate to meet relevant IHR and PVS core competencies.
capacities.as_measured_by_en: A workforce including physicians, animal health or veterinarians, biostatisticians, laboratory scientists, farming/livestock professionals, with an optimal target of one trained field epidemiologist (or equivalent) per 200,000 population, who can systematically cooperate to meet relevant IHR and PVS core competencies.
capacities.desired_impact_fr: Activités de prévention, de détection et d'intervention menées de manière efficace et durable par un personnel multisectoriel compétent, coordonné, évalué et diversifié sur le plan professionnel.
capacities.desired_impact_en: Prevention, detection, and response activities conducted effectively and sustainably by a fully competent, coordinated, evaluated and occupationally diverse multi-sectoral workforce.
capacities.notes_fr: L'indicateur fait référence à la capacité du personnel de santé publique pour le pays. La planification des ressources humaines en santé publique devrait comprendre: des épidémiologistes, des biostatisticiens, des spécialistes des systèmes d'information, des vétérinaires et d'autres membres du personnel de santé publique; l'indication des formations qui ont été dispensées au niveau national ou sont disponibles pour le personnel d'une entité partenaire ; la description des programmes de formation à long terme disponibles pour aider à élargir le bassin de professionnels de la santé publique qualifiés dans le pays. Formation de base en Epidémiologie de Terrain (FETP): Pour le personnel de santé local, elle comprend des heures de classe limitées réparties sur 3 à 5 mois sur le terrain pour renforcer la capacité de détection rapide des épidémies, d'intervention de santé publique et de surveillance de la santé publique. Formation FETP de niveau intermédiaire: Pour les épidémiologistes de niveau intermédiaire (district / région), il s'agit d'heures de classe limitées réparties sur 6 à 9 mois sur le terrain pour renforcer les capacités de mener des enquêtes épidémiologiques, des études épidémiologiques planifiées et des analyses de surveillance de santé publique et des évaluations. Formation de niveau avancé FETP: axée sur les épidémiologistes de niveau avancé, elle comprend des heures de classe limitées réparties sur 24 mois pour renforcer les capacités dans les enquêtes épidémiologiques, les études épidémiologiques planifiées, les analyses et les évaluations de surveillance de la santé publique, la communication scientifique et les preuves, et la prise de décision fondée sur l'élaboration de programmes de santé publique efficaces. Le développement du personnel est un élément transversal, et de nombreux autres aspects de la mise en œuvre du RSI dépendront des ressources humaines en santé publique.
capacities.notes_en: The indicator refers to public health workforce capacity for the country. Public health workforce planning should include: epidemiologists, biostatisticians, information systems specialists, veterinarians, and other public health personnel; indication of trainings that have been provided at a national level or are available to staff from a partner entity; description of long-term training programs that are available to help expand the pipeline of qualified public health professionals within the country. FETP Basic Level Training: For local health staff, it consists of limited classroom hours interspersed throughout 3–5 month on the job field assignments to build capacity in conducting timely outbreak detection, public health response, and public health surveillance. FETP Intermediate Level Training: For intermediate levels (district/regions) epidemiologists, it consists of limited classroom hours interspersed throughout 6- 9 month on the job mentored field assignments to build capacity in conducting outbreak investigations, planned epidemiologic studies, and public health surveillance analyses and evaluations. FETP Advanced Level Training: with a national focus for advanced epidemiologists, it consists of limited classroom hours interspersed throughout 24-month mentored field assignments to build capacity in outbreak investigations, planned epidemiologic studies, public health surveillance analyses and evaluations, scientific communication and evidence-based decision making for development of effective public health programming. Workforce development is a crosscutting element, and many other aspects of IHR implementation will depend on strong public health workforce.

capacities.name: Preparedness
capacities.target_description: Preparedness includes the development and maintenance of national, intermediate and local or primary response level public health emergency response plans for relevant biological, chemical, radiological and nuclear hazards. This covers mapping of potential hazards, identification and maintenance of available resources, including national stockpiles and the capacity to support operations at the intermediate and local or primary response levels during a public health emergency.
capacities.desired_impact: Emergency response operation up to sub-national (local and intermediate) level during public health emergency is successfully conducted in line with the emergency response plan with adequate support of resources and capacities.

indicators.name: Multi-hazard national public health emergency preparedness and response plan is developed and implemented

score_descriptions.1: National public health emergency preparedness and response plan is not available to meet the IHR core capacity requirements (Annex 1A Article 2)
score_descriptions.2: A multi-hazard national public health emergency preparedness and response plan to meet IHR core capacity requirements has been developed (Annex 1A Article 2)
score_descriptions.3: National public health emergency response plan(s) incorporates IHR related hazards and Points of Entry AND surge capacity to respond to public health emergencies of national and international concern is available
score_descriptions.4: Procedures, plans or strategy in place to reallocate or mobilize resources from national and intermediate levels to support action at local response level (including capacity to scaling up the level of response)
score_descriptions.5: The national public health emergency response plan(s) is implemented /tested in actual emergency or simulation exercises and updated as needed

indicators.name_fr: Un plan national de préparation et d'intervention en cas d'urgence sanitaire multirisque est élaboré et mis en œuvre
indicators.name_en: Multi-hazard national public health emergency preparedness and response plan is developed and implemented

score_descriptions_fr.1: Le plan national de préparation et d'intervention en cas d'urgence de santé publique n'est pas disponible pour répondre aux exigences de capacité de base du RSI (Annexe 1A Article 2)
score_descriptions_fr.2: Un plan national de préparation et d'intervention en cas d'urgence de santé publique multirisque pour intervenir aux principales exigences de capacité du RSI a été élaboré (annexe 1A, article 2)
score_descriptions_fr.3: Les plans nationaux d'intervention d'urgence en santé publique intègrent les dangers référéncés du RSI et les points d'entrée ET une capacité d'intervention rapide aux urgences de santé publique d'importance nationale et internationale sont disponibles
score_descriptions_fr.4: Les procédures, plans ou stratégies sont en place pour réaffecter ou mobiliser les ressources des niveaux national et intermédiaire afin de soutenir l'action au niveau local (y compris la capacité d'augmenter le niveau d'intervention)
score_descriptions_fr.5: Le (s) plan (s) national (aux) d'intervention d'urgence en santé publique est mis en œuvre / testé dans des exercices d'urgence réels ou de simulation et mis à jour au besoin

score_descriptions_en.1: National public health emergency preparedness and response plan is not available to meet the IHR core capacity requirements (Annex 1A Article 2)
score_descriptions_en.2: A multi-hazard national public health emergency preparedness and response plan to meet IHR core capacity requirements has been developed (Annex 1A Article 2)
score_descriptions_en.3: National public health emergency response plan(s) incorporates IHR related hazards and Points of Entry AND surge capacity to respond to public health emergencies of national and international concern is available
score_descriptions_en.4: Procedures, plans or strategy in place to reallocate or mobilize resources from national and intermediate levels to support action at local response level (including capacity to scaling up the level of response)
score_descriptions_en.5: The national public health emergency response plan(s) is implemented /tested in actual emergency or simulation exercises and updated as needed

indicators.name: Priority public health risks and resources are mapped and utilized

score_descriptions.1: Public health risk and resources mapping is not done
score_descriptions.2: A national risk assessment has been conducted to identify potential ‘urgent public health events’ and resource mapping has been done
score_descriptions.3: National resources have been mapped (logistics, experts, finance etc.) for IHR relevant hazards and priority risks and plan for management and distribution of national stockpiles is in place
score_descriptions.4: National profiles on risks and resources developed and reviewed at least an annual basis and stockpiles (critical stock levels) for responding to priority biological, chemical and radiological events and other emergencies are accessible
score_descriptions.5: The national risk profile and resources are assessed regularly to accommodate emerging threats

actions.name_fr: S'assurer que les stocks existants pour intervenir aux événements biologiques, chimiques et radiologiques prioritaires et autres urgences soient accessibles
actions.name_en: Ensure existing stockpiles for responding to priority biological, chemical and radiological events and other emergencies are accessible

indicators.name_fr: Les risques et les ressources prioritaires en matière de santé publique sont cartographiés et utilisés
indicators.name_en: Priority public health risks and resources are mapped and utilized

score_descriptions_fr.1: La cartographie des risques pour la santé publique et des ressources n'est pas faite
score_descriptions_fr.2: Une évaluation nationale des risques a été menée pour identifier les «événements urgents de santé publique» et la cartographie des ressources a été effectuée
score_descriptions_fr.3: Des ressources nationales ont été cartographiées (logistique, experts, finances, etc.) pour les dangers référencés du RSI et les risques prioritaires, et un plan de gestion et de distribution des stocks nationaux est en place
score_descriptions_fr.4: Des profils nationaux sur les risques et les ressources sont élaborés et révisés au moins une fois par an et les stocks (niveaux de stock critiques) pour répondre aux événements biologiques, chimiques et radiologiques prioritaires et autres urgences sont accessibles
score_descriptions_fr.5: Le profil de risque national et les ressources sont évalués régulièrement pour tenir compte des menaces émergentes

score_descriptions_en.1: Public health risk and resources mapping is not done
score_descriptions_en.2: A national risk assessment has been conducted to identify potential ‘urgent public health events’ and resource mapping has been done
score_descriptions_en.3: National resources have been mapped (logistics, experts, finance etc.) for IHR relevant hazards and priority risks and plan for management and distribution of national stockpiles is in place
score_descriptions_en.4: National profiles on risks and resources developed and reviewed at least an annual basis and stockpiles (critical stock levels) for responding to priority biological, chemical and radiological events and other emergencies are accessible
score_descriptions_en.5: The national risk profile and resources are assessed regularly to accommodate emerging threats

capacities.target_description_fr: La préparation comprend l'élaboration et le maintien de plans d'intervention d'urgence sanitaire au niveau national, intermédiaire et local ou primaire pour les risques biologiques, chimiques, radiologiques et nucléaires pertinents. Ceci couvre la cartographie des dangers potentiels, l'identification et la maintenance des ressources disponibles, y compris les stocks nationaux et la capacité à soutenir les opérations aux niveaux intermédiaire et local ou primaire en cas d'urgence de santé publique.
capacities.target_description_en: Preparedness includes the development and maintenance of national, intermediate and local or primary response level public health emergency response plans for relevant biological, chemical, radiological and nuclear hazards. This covers mapping of potential hazards, identification and maintenance of available resources, including national stockpiles and the capacity to support operations at the intermediate and local or primary response levels during a public health emergency.
capacities.desired_impact_fr: L'opération d'intervention d'urgence jusqu'au niveau infranational (local et intermédiaire) en cas d'urgence sanitaire est menée avec succès conformément au plan d'intervention d'urgence avec un soutien adéquat des ressources et des capacités.
capacities.desired_impact_en: Emergency response operation up to sub-national (local and intermediate) level during public health emergency is successfully conducted in line with the emergency response plan with adequate support of resources and capacities.

capacities.name: Emergency Response Operations
capacities.target_description: Countries will have a public health emergency operation centre (EOC) functioning according to minimum common standards; maintaining trained, functioning, multi-sectoral rapid response teams and “real-time” biosurveillance laboratory networks and information systems; and trained EOC staff capable of activating a coordinated emergency response within 120 minutes of the identification of a public health emergency.
capacities.as_measured_by: Documentation that a public health EOC meeting the above criteria is functioning.
capacities.desired_impact: Effective coordination and improved control of outbreaks as evidenced by shorter times from detection to response and smaller numbers of cases and deaths.
capacities.notes: The indicator refers to public health emergency operations for the country. The EOC should include: information systems to connect public health decision makers to appropriate data sources; communications equipment; staff that are trained and capable of coordinating an emergency response. Emergency operations plans should be developed that can be scalable and flexible to address emerging disease threats. Exercises should test the capacity of the emergency operations systems and staff to coordinate a large response affecting multiple communities, and involving multisectoral coordination. Functional exercises should be held on an annual basis; additional drills, table-top exercise and simulations can supplement the functional exercises.

indicators.name: Capacity to Activate Emergency Operations

score_descriptions.1: No identified procedures have been developed to determine when to activate public health emergency operations
score_descriptions.2: EOC point of contact is available 24/7 to guide response
score_descriptions.3: EOC staff team is trained in emergency management and PHEOC standard operating procedures and is available for response when necessary
score_descriptions.4: In addition to activities for “developed capacity”, there is dedicated EOC staff that has received training and can activate a response within two hours
score_descriptions.5: In addition to activities for “demonstrated capacity”, exercises are conducted two or more times per year to test EOC activation

actions.name_fr: Le personnel des COU peut activer une intervention dans les deux heures
actions.name_en: EOC staff can activate a response within two hours

indicators.name_fr: Capacité d'activer les interventions d'urgence
indicators.name_en: Capacity to Activate Emergency Operations

score_descriptions_fr.1: Aucune procédure identifiée n'a été élaborée pour déterminer quand activer les opérations d'urgence en santé publique
score_descriptions_fr.2: Le point de contact du COU est disponible 24h / 24 et 7j / 7 pour guider l'intervention
score_descriptions_fr.3: L'équipe du personnel des COU est formée à la gestion des urgences et aux procédures opératoires normalisées du COU et est disponible pour intervenir si nécessaire
score_descriptions_fr.4: En plus des activités pour la «capacité développée», il y a un personnel dédié aux COU qui a reçu une formation et peut activer une intervention dans les deux heures
score_descriptions_fr.5: En plus des activités pour la

score_descriptions_en.1: No identified procedures have been developed to determine when to activate public health emergency operations
score_descriptions_en.2: EOC point of contact is available 24/7 to guide response
score_descriptions_en.3: EOC staff team is trained in emergency management and PHEOC standard operating procedures and is available for response when necessary
score_descriptions_en.4: In addition to activities for “developed capacity”, there is dedicated EOC staff that has received training and can activate a response within two hours
score_descriptions_en.5: In addition to activities for “demonstrated capacity”, exercises are conducted two or more times per year to test EOC activation

indicators.name: Emergency Operations Centre Operating Procedures and Plan

score_descriptions.1: No EOC plans/procedures for Incident Management Structure (or equivalent) are in place
score_descriptions.2: EOC plans/procedures describing incident management structure (IMS) or equivalent structure are in place; plan describes key structural and operational elements for basic roles (including Incident management or command, Operations, Planning, Logistics and Finance)
score_descriptions.3: In addition to meeting requirements of “limited capacity”, EOC plans are in place for functions including public health science (epidemiology, medical and other subject matter expertise), public communications, partner liaison
score_descriptions.4: In addition to meeting “developed capacity”, the following EOC plans are in place: concept of operations; Forms and templates for data collection, reporting, briefing; Role descriptions and job aids for EOC functional positions
score_descriptions.5: In addition to meeting “demonstrated capacity”, response plans are in place that describe scaled levels of response with resource requirements for each level and procedures for acquiring additional resources

indicators.name_fr: Procédures et plan opérationel du Centre des Opérations d'Urgence
indicators.name_en: Emergency Operations Centre Operating Procedures and Plan

score_descriptions_fr.1: Aucun plan / procédure du COU pour la structure de gestion des incidents (ou l'équivalent) n'est en place
score_descriptions_fr.2: Les plans / procédures du COU qui décrivent la structure de gestion des incidents (SGI) ou une structure équivalente sont en place; le plan décrit les éléments structurels et opérationnels clés pour les rôles de base (y compris la gestion des incidents ou le commandement, les opérations, la planification, la logistique et les finances)
score_descriptions_fr.3: En plus de satisfaire aux exigences de «capacité limitée», les plans des COU sont en place pour les fonctions incluant les sciences de la santé publique (épidémiologie, expertise médicale et autres), les communications publiques, la liaison avec les partenaires
score_descriptions_fr.4: En plus de répondre à la «capacité développée», les plans de COU suivants sont en place: concept des opérations; Formulaires et modèles pour la collecte de données, les rapports, les briefings; Des descriptions de rôles et des outils de travail pour les postes fonctionnels des COU
score_descriptions_fr.5: En plus de répondre à la «capacité démontrée», des plans d'intervention sont en place pour décrire les différents niveaux d'intervention avec les besoins en ressources pour chaque niveau et les procédures d'acquisition des ressources supplémentaires.

score_descriptions_en.1: No EOC plans/procedures for Incident Management Structure (or equivalent) are in place
score_descriptions_en.2: EOC plans/procedures describing incident management structure (IMS) or equivalent structure are in place; plan describes key structural and operational elements for basic roles (including Incident management or command, Operations, Planning, Logistics and Finance)
score_descriptions_en.3: In addition to meeting requirements of “limited capacity”, EOC plans are in place for functions including public health science (epidemiology, medical and other subject matter expertise), public communications, partner liaison
score_descriptions_en.4: In addition to meeting “developed capacity”, the following EOC plans are in place: concept of operations; Forms and templates for data collection, reporting, briefing; Role descriptions and job aids for EOC functional positions
score_descriptions_en.5: In addition to meeting “demonstrated capacity”, response plans are in place that describe scaled levels of response with resource requirements for each level and procedures for acquiring additional resources

indicators.name: Emergency Operations Program

score_descriptions.1: No exercises have been completed
score_descriptions.2: Table top exercise has been completed to test systems and decision making
score_descriptions.3: Functional exercise has been completed to test operations capabilities but EOC has not yet been activated for a response. System is not yet capable of activating a coordinated emergency response within 120 minutes of the identification of a public health emergency
score_descriptions.4: EOC activated a coordinated emergency response or exercise within 120 minutes of the identification of a public health emergency; response utilized operations, logistic and planning functions
score_descriptions.5: In addition to achieving demonstrated capacity, a follow up evaluation was conducted and corrective action plan was developed and implemented

inputs.name_fr: Tenir un exercice fonctionnel

actions.name_fr: Effectuer un exercice fonctionnel dans lequel le COU est activé avec succès (y compris ses fonctions operationelles, de logistique et de planification) dans les 120 minutes suivant l'identification d'une urgence sanitaire
actions.name_en:
Conduct functional exercise in which EOC is successfully activated (including operations,
logistic and planning functions) within 120 minutes of the identification of a public health emergency

indicators.name_fr: Programme d'interventions d'urgence
indicators.name_en: Emergency Operations Program

score_descriptions_fr.1: Aucun exercice n'a été complété
score_descriptions_fr.2: Un exercice de simulation a été complété pour tester les systèmes et la prise de décision
score_descriptions_fr.3: L'exercice fonctionnel a été complété pour tester les capacités opérationnelles, mais le COU n'a pas encore été activé pour une intervention. Le système n'est pas encore capable d'activer une intervention d'urgence coordonnée dans les 120 minutes suivant l'identification d'une urgence de santé publique
score_descriptions_fr.4: Le COU a activé une intervention d'urgence coordonnée ou un exercice dans les 120 minutes suivant l'identification d'une urgence de santé publique; l'intervention a utilisé les opérations, les fonctions logistiques et de planification
score_descriptions_fr.5: En plus de la capacité démontrée, une évaluation de suivi a été effectuée et un plan d'action correctif a été élaboré et mis en œuvre.

score_descriptions_en.1: No exercises have been completed
score_descriptions_en.2: Table top exercise has been completed to test systems and decision making
score_descriptions_en.3: Functional exercise has been completed to test operations capabilities but EOC has not yet been activated for a response. System is not yet capable of activating a coordinated emergency response within 120 minutes of the identification of a public health emergency
score_descriptions_en.4: EOC activated a coordinated emergency response or exercise within 120 minutes of the identification of a public health emergency; response utilized operations, logistic and planning functions
score_descriptions_en.5: In addition to achieving demonstrated capacity, a follow up evaluation was conducted and corrective action plan was developed and implemented

indicators.name: Case management procedures are implemented for IHR relevant hazards

score_descriptions.1: No case management guidelines are available for priority epidemic-prone diseases
score_descriptions.2: Case management guidelines are available for priority epidemic-prone diseases
score_descriptions.3: Case management guidelines for other IHR relevant hazards are available at relevant health system levels and SOPs are available for the management and transport of potentially infectious patients in the community and at PoE
score_descriptions.4: Case management, patient referral and transportation, and management and transport of potentially infectious patients are implemented according to guidelines and/or SOPs
score_descriptions.5: In addition to demonstrated capacity, appropriate staff and resources (as defined by the country) is in place in management of relevant IHR-related emergencies

indicators.name_fr: Des procédures de prise en charge de cas sont mises en œuvre pour les dangers relevant au RSI
indicators.name_en: Case management procedures are implemented for IHR relevant hazards

score_descriptions_fr.1: Aucune directive de gestion de cas n'est disponible pour les maladies à potentiel épidémique prioritaire
score_descriptions_fr.2: Des directives de gestion de cas sont disponibles pour les maladies à potentiel épidémique prioritaires
score_descriptions_fr.3: Des directives de gestion de cas pour d'autres dangers référencés au RSI sont disponibles aux niveaux pertinents du système de santé et des PON sont disponibles pour la gestion et le transport de patients potentiellement infectieux dans la communauté et au Points d'Entrée.
score_descriptions_fr.4: La prise en charge des cas, l'orientation et le transport des patients, ainsi que la prise en charge et le transport des patients potentiellement infectieux sont mis en œuvre conformément aux lignes directrices et / ou aux PON
score_descriptions_fr.5: En plus de la capacité démontrée, le personnel et les ressources appropriés (tels que définis par le pays) sont en place dans la gestion des urgences pertinentes liées au RSI.

score_descriptions_en.1: No case management guidelines are available for priority epidemic-prone diseases
score_descriptions_en.2: Case management guidelines are available for priority epidemic-prone diseases
score_descriptions_en.3: Case management guidelines for other IHR relevant hazards are available at relevant health system levels and SOPs are available for the management and transport of potentially infectious patients in the community and at PoE
score_descriptions_en.4: Case management, patient referral and transportation, and management and transport of potentially infectious patients are implemented according to guidelines and/or SOPs
score_descriptions_en.5: In addition to demonstrated capacity, appropriate staff and resources (as defined by the country) is in place in management of relevant IHR-related emergencies

capacities.target_description_fr: Les pays auront un centre d'opérations d'urgence en santé publique (COU) fonctionnant selon des normes communes minimales; maintenir des équipes d'intervention rapide formées, opérationnelles et multisectorielles et des réseaux de laboratoires de biosurveillance «en temps réel» et des systèmes d'information ; et le personnel des COU formé et capable d'activer une intervention d'urgence coordonnée dans les 120 minutes suivant l'identification d'une urgence de santé publique.
capacities.target_description_en: Countries will have a public health emergency operation centre (EOC) functioning according to minimum common standards; maintaining trained, functioning, multi-sectoral rapid response teams and “real-time” biosurveillance laboratory networks and information systems; and trained EOC staff capable of activating a coordinated emergency response within 120 minutes of the identification of a public health emergency.
capacities.as_measured_by_en: Documentation that a public health EOC meeting the above criteria is functioning.
capacities.desired_impact_fr: Une coordination efficace et un meilleur contrôle des épidémies, avec comme témoin les délais raccourcis entre la détection et l'intervention, et le plus petit nombre de cas et de décès.
capacities.desired_impact_en: Effective coordination and improved control of outbreaks as evidenced by shorter times from detection to response and smaller numbers of cases and deaths.
capacities.notes_fr: L'indicateur fait référence aux opérations d'urgence sanitaire pour le pays. Le COU devrait inclure: des systèmes d'information pour relier les décideurs en santé publique aux sources de données appropriées; du matériel de communication; du personnel formé et capable de coordonner une intervention d'urgence. Des plans d'opérations d'urgence devraient être élaborés qui peuvent être évolutifs et flexibles pour faire face aux menaces émergentes de maladies. Les exercices devraient tester la capacité des systèmes d'opérations d'urgence et du personnel à coordonner une vaste intervention affectant plusieurs communautés et impliquant une coordination multisectorielle. Des exercices fonctionnels devraient être organisés chaque année; des exercices supplémentaires, des exercices de scénarios et des simulations peuvent compléter les exercices fonctionnels.
capacities.notes_en: The indicator refers to public health emergency operations for the country. The EOC should include: information systems to connect public health decision makers to appropriate data sources; communications equipment; staff that are trained and capable of coordinating an emergency response. Emergency operations plans should be developed that can be scalable and flexible to address emerging disease threats. Exercises should test the capacity of the emergency operations systems and staff to coordinate a large response affecting multiple communities, and involving multisectoral coordination. Functional exercises should be held on an annual basis; additional drills, table-top exercise and simulations can supplement the functional exercises.

capacities.name: Linking Public Health and Security Authorities
capacities.target_description: In the event of a biological event of suspected or confirmed deliberate origin, a country will be able to conduct a rapid, multisectoral response, including the capacity to link public health and law enforcement, and to provide and/or request effective and timely international assistance, including to investigate alleged use events.
capacities.as_measured_by: Evidence of at least one response within the previous year that effectively links public health and law enforcement, OR a formal exercise or simulation involving leadership from the country’s public health and law enforcement communities.
capacities.desired_impact: Development and implementation of a memorandum of understanding (MOU) or other similar framework outlining roles, responsibilities, and best practices for sharing relevant information between and among appropriate human and animal health, law enforcement, and defence personnel and validation of the MOU through periodic exercises and simulations. In collaboration with FAO, International Criminal Police Organization (INTERPOL), OIE, WHO, individual Biological and Toxin Weapons Convention States Parties (and where appropriate the Implementation Support Unit), the United Nations Secretary-General’s Mechanism for Investigation of Alleged Use of Chemical and Biological Weapons (UNSGM), and other relevant regional and international organizations as appropriate, countries will develop and implement model systems to conduct and support joint criminal and epidemiological investigations to identify and respond to suspected biological incidents of deliberate origin.
capacities.notes: Multisectoral collaboration is key to engaging in effective public health emergency response. Security Authorities may include law enforcement, border control officers, defence and/or customs enforcement. Effective multisectoral collaboration should also include food safety inspectors and animal health authorities.

indicators.name: Public Health and Security Authorities, (e.g. Law Enforcement, Border Control, Customs) are linked during a suspect or confirmed biological event

score_descriptions.1: No legal background, relationships, protocols, MOUs or other agreements exist between public health, animal health and security authorities
score_descriptions.2: Points-of-contact and triggers for notification and information sharing have been identified and shared between public health, animal health and security authorities
score_descriptions.3: Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) or other agreement (i.e., protocol) exists between public health and security authorities within the country and has been formally accepted
score_descriptions.4: At least 1 public health emergency response or exercise within the previous year that included information sharing with Security Authorities using the formal MOU or other agreement (i.e., protocol)
score_descriptions.5: Public health and security authorities exchange reports and information on events of joint concern at national, intermediate and local levels using the formal MOU or other agreement (i.e., protocol) public health and security authorities engage in a joint training program to orient, exercise, and institutionalize knowledge of MOU or other agreements

indicators.name_fr: Les autorités chargées de la santé publique et de la sécurité (par exemple, l'application de la loi, le contrôle des frontières, les douanes) sont en liaison lors d'un événement biologique suspect ou confirmé
indicators.name_en: Public Health and Security Authorities, (e.g. Law Enforcement, Border Control, Customs) are linked during a suspect or confirmed biological event

score_descriptions_fr.1: Il n'existe pas d'antécédents juridiques, de relations, de protocoles, de protocoles d'entente ou d'autres accords entre les autorités de santé publique, de santé animale et de sécurité
score_descriptions_fr.2: Des points de contact et des déclencheurs pour la notification et le partage d'informations ont été identifiés et partagés entre les autorités de santé publique, de santé animale et de sécurité
score_descriptions_fr.3: Un protocole d'entente ou un autre accord existe entre les autorités de la santé publique et de la sécurité dans le pays et a été formellement accepté
score_descriptions_fr.4: Au moins 1 intervention ou exercice d'urgence en santé publique a eu lieu au cours de l'année précédente incluant le partage d'information avec les autorités de sécurité en utilisant le protocole d'entente officiel ou un autre accord
score_descriptions_fr.5: Les autorités de santé et de sécurité publiques échangent des rapports et des informations sur les événements d'intérêt commun aux niveaux national, intermédiaire et local en utilisant le protocole d'accord formel ou un autre accord, les autorités de santé publique et de sécurité s'engagent dans un programme de formation conjoint pour orienter, exercer et institutionnaliser la connaissance des protocoles d'entente ou d'autres accords

score_descriptions_en.1: No legal background, relationships, protocols, MOUs or other agreements exist between public health, animal health and security authorities
score_descriptions_en.2: Points-of-contact and triggers for notification and information sharing have been identified and shared between public health, animal health and security authorities
score_descriptions_en.3: Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) or other agreement (i.e., protocol) exists between public health and security authorities within the country and has been formally accepted
score_descriptions_en.4: At least 1 public health emergency response or exercise within the previous year that included information sharing with Security Authorities using the formal MOU or other agreement (i.e., protocol)
score_descriptions_en.5: Public health and security authorities exchange reports and information on events of joint concern at national, intermediate and local levels using the formal MOU or other agreement (i.e., protocol) public health and security authorities engage in a joint training program to orient, exercise, and institutionalize knowledge of MOU or other agreements

capacities.name_fr: Lier les autorités de santé publique et les autorités de sécurité
capacities.name_en: Linking Public Health and Security Authorities
capacities.target_description_fr: En cas d'événement biologique d'origine délibérée suspectée ou confirmée, un pays pourra mener une action multisectorielle rapide, y compris la capacité de relier la santé publique et l'application de la loi, et fournir et / ou solliciter une aide internationale efficace et opportune, y compris pour enquêter sur les événements présumés d'utilisation.
capacities.target_description_en: In the event of a biological event of suspected or confirmed deliberate origin, a country will be able to conduct a rapid, multisectoral response, including the capacity to link public health and law enforcement, and to provide and/or request effective and timely international assistance, including to investigate alleged use events.
capacities.as_measured_by_en: Evidence of at least one response within the previous year that effectively links public health and law enforcement, OR a formal exercise or simulation involving leadership from the country’s public health and law enforcement communities.
capacities.desired_impact_fr: Élaboration et mise en œuvre d'un protocole d'entente définissant les rôles, les responsabilités et les pratiques exemplaires pour le partage de l'information pertinente entre le personnel compétent en santé humaine et animale, l'application de la loi et la défense et la validation du protocole d'entente par des exercices périodiques et des simulations. En collaboration avec la FAO, l'Organisation internationale de police criminelle (INTERPOL), l'OIE, l'OMS, les États parties à la Convention (et, le cas échéant, l'Unité d'appui à la mise en œuvre), le Mécanisme permettant au Secrétaire Général d’enquêter sur les allégations d’emploi d’armes chimiques, biologiques et à toxines (UNODA) et d'autres organisations régionales et internationales pertinentes, selon le cas, développeront et mettront en œuvre des systèmes modèles pour mener et soutenir des enquêtes criminelles et épidémiologiques conjointes afin d'identifier et de répondre aux incidents biologiques présumés d'origine délibérée.
capacities.desired_impact_en: Development and implementation of a memorandum of understanding (MOU) or other similar framework outlining roles, responsibilities, and best practices for sharing relevant information between and among appropriate human and animal health, law enforcement, and defence personnel and validation of the MOU through periodic exercises and simulations. In collaboration with FAO, International Criminal Police Organization (INTERPOL), OIE, WHO, individual Biological and Toxin Weapons Convention States Parties (and where appropriate the Implementation Support Unit), the United Nations Secretary-General’s Mechanism for Investigation of Alleged Use of Chemical and Biological Weapons (UNSGM), and other relevant regional and international organizations as appropriate, countries will develop and implement model systems to conduct and support joint criminal and epidemiological investigations to identify and respond to suspected biological incidents of deliberate origin.
capacities.notes_fr: La collaboration multisectorielle est la clé d'une intervention efficace en matière d'urgence sanitaire. Les autorités de sécurité peuvent inclure l'application de la loi, les agents de contrôle des frontières, la défense et / ou l'application des douanes. Une collaboration multisectorielle efficace devrait également inclure les inspecteurs de la sécurité des aliments et les autorités de santé animale.
capacities.notes_en: Multisectoral collaboration is key to engaging in effective public health emergency response. Security Authorities may include law enforcement, border control officers, defence and/or customs enforcement. Effective multisectoral collaboration should also include food safety inspectors and animal health authorities.

capacities.name: Medical Countermeasures and Personnel Deployment
capacities.target_description: A national framework for transferring (sending and receiving) medical countermeasures and public health and medical personnel among international partners during public health emergencies.
capacities.as_measured_by: Evidence of at least 1 response to a public health emergency within the previous year that demonstrates that the country sent or received medical countermeasures and personnel according to written national or international protocols, OR a formal exercise or simulation that demonstrates these things.
capacities.desired_impact: Countries will have the necessary legal and regulatory processes and logistical plans to allow for the rapid cross-border deployment and receipt of public health and medical personnel during emergencies. Regional (international) collaboration will assist countries in overcoming the legal, logistical and regulatory challenges to deployment of public health and medical personnel from one country to another.
capacities.notes: If country has a stockpile of medical countermeasures, country will not be asked to provide a list or formulary.

indicators.name: System is in place for sending and receiving medical countermeasures during a public health emergency

score_descriptions.1: No national countermeasures plan has been drafted
score_descriptions.2: Plans have been drafted that outline system for sending and receiving medical countermeasures during public health emergencies
score_descriptions.3: Table-top exercise(s) has been conducted to demonstrate sending or receiving of medical countermeasures during a public health emergency
score_descriptions.4: At least one response OR a formal exercise or simulation within the previous year in which medical countermeasures were sent or received by the country
score_descriptions.5: Country participates in a regional/international partnership or has formal agreement with another country or international organization that outlines criteria and procedures for sending and receiving medical countermeasures AND has participated in an exercise or response within the past year to practice deployment or receipt of medical countermeasures

capacities.name_fr: Contre-mesures médicales et déploiement du personnel
capacities.target_description_fr: Un cadre national de transfert (envoi et réception) de contre-mesures médicales et de personnel de santé publique et médical parmi les partenaires internationaux lors d'urgences sanitaires.
capacities.target_description_en: A national framework for transferring (sending and receiving) medical countermeasures and public health and medical personnel among international partners during public health emergencies.
capacities.as_measured_by_en: Evidence of at least 1 response to a public health emergency within the previous year that demonstrates that the country sent or received medical countermeasures and personnel according to written national or international protocols, OR a formal exercise or simulation that demonstrates these things.
capacities.desired_impact_fr: Les pays auront les processus juridiques et réglementaires nécessaires et les plans logistiques nécessaires pour permettre le déploiement rapide et transfrontalier du personnel médical et sanitaire en cas d'urgence. La collaboration régionale (internationale) aidera les pays à surmonter les obstacles juridiques, logistiques et réglementaires au déploiement du personnel médical et sanitaire d'un pays à l'autre.
capacities.desired_impact_en: Countries will have the necessary legal and regulatory processes and logistical plans to allow for the rapid cross-border deployment and receipt of public health and medical personnel during emergencies. Regional (international) collaboration will assist countries in overcoming the legal, logistical and regulatory challenges to deployment of public health and medical personnel from one country to another.
capacities.notes_fr: Si le pays dispose d'un stock de contre-mesures médicales, il ne sera pas demandé au pays de fournir une liste ou un formulaire.
capacities.notes_en: If country has a stockpile of medical countermeasures, country will not be asked to provide a list or formulary.

capacities.name: Risk Communication
capacities.target_description: States Parties should have risk communication capacity which is multi-level and multi-faced, real time exchange of information, advice and opinion between experts and officials or people who face a threat or hazard to their survival, health or economic or social well-being so that they can take informed decisions to mitigate the effects of the threat or hazard and take protective and preventive action. It includes a mix of communication and engagement strategies like media and social media communication, mass awareness campaigns, health promotion, social mobilization, stakeholder engagement and community engagement.
capacities.desired_impact: Responsible entities effectively communicate and actively listen and incorporate the publics’ and communities’ concerns through the media, social media, mass awareness campaigns, health promotion, social mobilization, stakeholder engagement and community engagement for increased risk awareness to reduce and mitigate the expected impact of the health hazard before during and after public health events.
capacities.notes: Under the current IHR (2005) capacity assessment framework, only one element of the key components of risk communication – public communication – was assessed. The elements assessed focused predominantly on outputs of public communications activities. The revised framework proposed here addresses risk communications outcomes. The framework builds on the existing IHR capacity assessment content, and draws on an evidence-based “logic model” for evaluating emergency risk communication outcomes developed jointly by WHO and Harvard School of Public Health in 2014. Domain 5 (Dynamic listening and rumour management) should be assessed independently as well as in relation to domains 2 (Internal and partner communication and coordination), 3 (Public communication) and 4 (Communication engagement with affected communities).

indicators.name: Risk Communication Systems (plans,mechanisms, etc.)

score_descriptions.1: No formal government risk communication arrangement
score_descriptions.2: Formal government arrangement including a national multi-hazard emergency risk communication plan (reviewed within past 24 months) in place and a dedicated core team responsible for this area of work established; but significant gaps in capacity in human resources, platforms, and resources to deal with a large-scale emergency
score_descriptions.3: Formal government arrangements and systems in place with standard operating procedures and capacity with multisectoral and multi-stakeholder involvement, but insufficient allocation and alignment of human and financial resources
score_descriptions.4: Fully operational national system established meeting criteria of all previous levels, with reasonable skilled and/or trained personnel and volunteers, and financial resources and arrangements for scale-up as evidenced by a simulation exercise or tested by a real health emergency
score_descriptions.5: Lessons learnt from capacity level 4 integrated into the revision of the national plans and the continuous strengthening of the system. Regular allocation of resources to maintain and grow the system

indicators.name_fr: Systèmes de communication des risques (plans, mécanismes, etc.)
indicators.name_en: Risk Communication Systems (plans,mechanisms, etc.)

score_descriptions_fr.1: Pas d'arrangement formel de communication sur les risques du gouvernement
score_descriptions_fr.2: Un arrangement officiel du gouvernement comprenant un plan national de communication sur les risques d'urgence multirisques (révisé au cours des 24 derniers mois) est en place et une équipe de base spécialisée responsable de ce domaine de travail est établie ; mais des lacunes importantes persistent dans la capacité en ressources humaines, les plateformes et ressources pour faire face à une situation d'urgence à grande échelle
score_descriptions_fr.3: Des arrangements officiels et des systèmes gouvernementaux sont en place avec des procédures opérationnelles normalisées et une capacité de participation multisectorielle et multipartite, mais il y a insuffisance en allocation et alignement des ressources humaines et financières
score_descriptions_fr.4: Un système national entièrement opérationnel a établi des critères pour tous les niveaux précédents, avec du personnel et des volontaires compétents et / ou qualifiés, ainsi que des ressources financières et des dispositions pour l'amélioration, comme en témoigne un exercice de simulation ou une véritable urgence sanitaire
score_descriptions_fr.5: Les enseignements tirés du niveau de capacité 4 sont intégrés dans la révision des plans nationaux et le renforcement continu du système. Il y a allocation régulière des ressources pour maintenir et développer le système

score_descriptions_en.1: No formal government risk communication arrangement
score_descriptions_en.2: Formal government arrangement including a national multi-hazard emergency risk communication plan (reviewed within past 24 months) in place and a dedicated core team responsible for this area of work established; but significant gaps in capacity in human resources, platforms, and resources to deal with a large-scale emergency
score_descriptions_en.3: Formal government arrangements and systems in place with standard operating procedures and capacity with multisectoral and multi-stakeholder involvement, but insufficient allocation and alignment of human and financial resources
score_descriptions_en.4: Fully operational national system established meeting criteria of all previous levels, with reasonable skilled and/or trained personnel and volunteers, and financial resources and arrangements for scale-up as evidenced by a simulation exercise or tested by a real health emergency
score_descriptions_en.5: Lessons learnt from capacity level 4 integrated into the revision of the national plans and the continuous strengthening of the system. Regular allocation of resources to maintain and grow the system

indicators.name: Internal and Partner Communication and Coordination

score_descriptions.1: No coordination platform and mechanisms for internal and partner communication for engaging key national, intermediate, local and international stakeholders (including health care workers)
score_descriptions.2: Some ad hoc communication coordination such as meetings with some partners and/or irregular information-sharing
score_descriptions.3: Communication coordination exists but with limited partner and stakeholder engagement including health care workers, civil society organizations, private sector and other non-state actors
score_descriptions.4: Effective, regular communication coordination with all partners required by all preceding levels, and their coordination tested by a simulation exercise or tested by a real health emergency
score_descriptions.5: Effective, regular and inclusive communication coordination with partners and stakeholders including definition of roles, sharing of resources and joint action plans

actions.name: Develop plan for coordination platform and mechanisms for internal and partner communication

inputs.name: Hire national consultant to draft national communication coordination plan

line_items.name: Daily fees (total)
line_items.description: Fees for 40-days of consultant time to draft national communication coordination plan, covering internal and partner communication for engaging key national, intermediate, local and international stakeholders (including health care workers)
line_items.function_tag: Planning including assessment, design, planning, policy, legislation
line_items.references: Equivalent of 40 days' work by external consultant (national) for research, meetings, outreach, and travel. Default fees per day is UN Level D maximum daily rate established October 2013 (Source: ST/AI/2013/4). Default per diem is official WHO/UN per diem for Nairobi, Kenya.
line_items.where_find_base_cost: Daily rate: use UN Level D or local market daily rates for expert consultant, and adjust the number of days as needed. Per diem: use official WHO/UN per diem or local government per diem.
line_items.description_fr: Honoraires pour 40 jours de temps d'un consultant pour rédiger un plan national de coordination de la communication, couvrant la communication interne et la communication avec les partenaires pour impliquer les principales parties prenantes nationales, intermédiaires, locales et internationales (y compris les agents santé)
line_items.description_en: Fees for 40-days of consultant time to draft national communication coordination plan, covering internal and partner communication for engaging key national, intermediate, local and international stakeholders (including health care workers)
line_items.function_tag_fr: Planification incluant l'évaluation, la conception, la planification, la réglementation, la législation
line_items.function_tag_en: Planning including assessment, design, planning, policy, legislation
line_items.references_fr: Équivalent de 40 jours de travail par un consultant externe (national) pour la recherche, les réunions, la sensibilisation et les voyages. Les frais par jour par défaut correspondent au taux journalier maximal de niveau D des Nations Unies établi en octobre 2013 (Source: ST / AI / 2013/4). Le per diem par défaut est le per diem OMS / ONU pour Nairobi, Kenya.
line_items.references_en: Equivalent of 40 days' work by external consultant (national) for research, meetings, outreach, and travel. Default fees per day is UN Level D maximum daily rate established October 2013 (Source: ST/AI/2013/4). Default per diem is official WHO/UN per diem for Nairobi, Kenya.
line_items.where_find_base_cost_fr: Tarif par jour: utiliser les tarifs par jour de niveau D de l'ONU ou les tarifs par jour du marché local pour les consultants experts, et ajuster le nombre de jours si nécessaire. Per diem: utiliser les per diem officiels de l'OMS / ONU ou du gouvernement local.
line_items.where_find_base_cost_en: Daily rate: use UN Level D or local market daily rates for expert consultant, and adjust the number of days as needed. Per diem: use official WHO/UN per diem or local government per diem.

inputs.name_fr: Recruter un consultant national pour rédiger un plan national de coordination de la communication

inputs.name: Hold stakeholder workshop to develop and finalize national communication coordination plan

line_items.name: Workshop expenditures
line_items.description: Expenses for a small, 1-day, national workshop for national government, public sector, and private sector stakeholders to develop and finalize a communication coordination plan, covering internal and partner communication for engaging key national, intermediate, local and international stakeholders (including health care workers). Includes facility rental, stationary, refreshments, and other incidentals.
line_items.function_tag: Planning including assessment, design, planning, policy, legislation
line_items.references: Assume 1 full-day, small workshop
line_items.where_find_base_cost: Conference costs: determine per person costs for full-day workshop based on local conference rates (refreshments, stationery, incidentals, and venue) at NATIONAL LEVEL. Multiply by the number of participants to determine the per workshop cost, and adjust the base multiplier (number of workshops) as needed.
line_items.description_fr: Frais d'un petit atelier national d'une journée pour les parties prenantes du gouvernement, du secteur public et du secteur privé afin d'élaborer et de finaliser un plan de coordination de la communication couvrant la communication interne et avec des partenaires pour les principaux acteurs nationaux, intermédiaires, locaux et internationaux (y compris lesagent de santé). Comprend la location d'installations, la papeterie, les rafraîchissements et autres frais accessoires.
line_items.description_en: Expenses for a small, 1-day, national workshop for national government, public sector, and private sector stakeholders to develop and finalize a communication coordination plan, covering internal and partner communication for engaging key national, intermediate, local and international stakeholders (including health care workers). Includes facility rental, stationary, refreshments, and other incidentals.
line_items.function_tag_fr: Planification incluant l'évaluation, la conception, la planification, la réglementation, la législation
line_items.function_tag_en: Planning including assessment, design, planning, policy, legislation
line_items.references_fr: Présumer 1 petit atelier d'une journée
line_items.references_en: Assume 1 full-day, small workshop
line_items.where_find_base_cost_fr: Coûts de conférence: déterminer les coûts par personne pour un atelier d'une journée basé sur les tarifs des conférences locales (rafraîchissements, papeterie, frais accessoires et salle) au NIVEAU NATIONAL. Multiplier par le nombre de participants pour déterminer le coût par atelier, et ajuster le multiplicateur de base (nombre d'ateliers) selon les besoins.
line_items.where_find_base_cost_en: Conference costs: determine per person costs for full-day workshop based on local conference rates (refreshments, stationery, incidentals, and venue) at NATIONAL LEVEL. Multiply by the number of participants to determine the per workshop cost, and adjust the base multiplier (number of workshops) as needed.

Includes facility rental, stationary, refreshments, and other incidentals.
line_items.references: Assume 1 full-day, small workshop per intermediate area
line_items.where_find_base_cost: Conference costs: determine per person costs for full-day workshop based on local conference rates (refreshments, stationery, incidentals, and venue) at INTERMEDIATE LEVEL. Multiply by the number of participants to determine the per workshop cost, and adjust the base multiplier (number of workshops) as needed.
line_items.description_fr: Dépenses pour des réunions annuelles de petite envergure dans chaque secteur intermédiaire pour examiner les processus de communication et de coordination internes et avec les partenaires, y compris l'engagement avec lesagent de santé, les organisations de la société civile, le secteur privé et d'autres acteurs non étatiques. Comprend la location d'installations, la papeterie, les rafraîchissements et autres frais accessoires.
line_items.description_en: Expenses for annual, small, 1-day meetings in each intermediate area to review internal and partner communication and coordination processes, including engagement with health care workers, civil society organizations, private sector, and other non-state actors. Includes facility rental, stationary, refreshments, and other incidentals.

Multiplier par le nombre de participants pour déterminer le coût par atelier, et ajuster le multiplicateur de base (nombre d'ateliers) selon les besoins.
line_items.where_find_base_cost_en: Conference costs: determine per person costs for full-day workshop based on local conference rates (refreshments, stationery, incidentals, and venue) at INTERMEDIATE LEVEL. Multiply by the number of participants to determine the per workshop cost, and adjust the base multiplier (number of workshops) as needed.
